abs_Original: QUY TRÌNH SẢN XUẤT THỰC PHẨM CHỨC NĂNG BỔ DƯỠNG SỨC KHỎE TỪ MỠ ĐÀ ĐIỂU VÀ CAO CHIẾT THẢO DƯỢC|Sáng chế đề cập đến quy trình sản xuất thực phẩm chức năng bổ dưỡng sức khỏe từ mỡ đà điểu và cao chiết thảo dược bao gồm các bước :  a) Điều chế dầu đà điểu :  từ nguyên liệu mỡ ban đầu chiết bằng n-hexan,  lọc qua cột silicagel,  xà phòng hóa bằng NaOH 0, 5M trong etanol 70%,  b) Điều chế cao dược liệu :  cao linh chi được điều chế bằng phương pháp chiết nước;  cao chố xanh chế biến từ lá chố xanh khô,  ngâm chiết với clorofom,  thu bã chiết,  sấy khô. Tiến hành chiết 3 lần bằng cồn 96°,  cất loại dung môi trong nồi cô đến dạng cao lỏng,  chiết lại bằng etylaxetat,  thu lấy phần dịch etylaxetat,  lọc,  cô đuổi dung môi đến khô,  sấy cao khô đến độ ẩm < 3%. c) Phối trộn tạo sản phẩm :  tỷ lệ phối trộn tính cho 1 viên nang mềm 500 mg là cao khô linh chi 150mg,  dầu đà điểu 250mg,  cao khô chố xanh 25mg,  và vitamin E :  15g.

abs_English: Circular rice paper production equipment|Useful scheme refers to the round coated cake production equipment that meets the production technical requirements,  changing from diluted rice flour to round coated cake with reasonable diameter and thickness. The device comprises a shaping shaft (1.6. 3) having two floating oval convex surfaces,  made of a food rubber material which facilitates the adhesion of rice flour to the convex surfaces and also facilitates the stamping of rice flour therefrom to the fabric conveyor surface (2.1) of the steamed bag subassembly. The speed of forming shaft (1.6. 3) and fabric conveyor (2.1) can be regulated by frequency converter. The diameter of the coated gear is adjustable by replacing the forming shaft (1.6. 3). The thickness of the coating cake is directly adjusted on the equipment by adjusting the powder layer adhered to the convex surfaces of the forming shaft and the gap between these convex surfaces and the surface of the fabric conveyor belt. The steamed stuffed bun cooking assembly (3) designed ensures uniform ripening of steamed stuffed bun without heat loss. The pie after coming out of the steamer is cooled by the fan system,  then the pie is removed from the cloth belt (2.1) with a scraper and stacked on the pie (3.4).
abs_Chinese: 圆形包覆饼生产设备|有用的方案是指满足生产技术要求的圆形包覆饼生产设备，由稀释米粉变成直径，厚度合理的圆形包覆饼。 该装置包括成形轴(1.6.3)，具有两个浮动的椭圆形凸面，由食品橡胶材料制成，该材料有利于米粉与凸面的粘合，也便于将米粉从其上冲压到蒸包子组件的织物传送带表面(2.1)。 成形轴(1.6.3)以及织物输送机(2.1)的速度可通过变频器进行调速。 通过更换成形轴(1.6.3)，涂层齿轮的直径可调。 通过调整粘在成形轴凸面上的粉末层以及这些凸面与织物输送带表面之间的间隙，在设备上直接调整涂层饼的厚度。 所设计的包子蒸煮组件(3)保证了包子的成熟均匀，没有热量损失。 从蒸锅出来后的馅饼通过风扇系统冷却，然后用刮刀将馅饼从布料带(2.1)上取下，并将其堆放到馅饼(3.4)上。
abs_Original: THIẾT BỊ SẢN XUẤT BÁNH TRÁNG DẠNG TRÒN|Giải pháp hữu ích đề cập đến thiết bị sản xuất bánh tráng dạng tròn đáp ứng được yêu cầu của công nghệ sản xuất từ bột gạo pha loãng thành bánh tráng dạng tròn có đường kính và độ dày hợp lý. Thiết bị này bao gồm trục tạo hình (1.6.3) có hai mặt lồi dạng hình elip được đắp nổi và được làm bằng vật liệu cao su thực phẩm,  vật liệu này tạo điều kiện thuận lợi cho sự bám dính của bột gạo lên các bề mặt lồi cũng nhu cho quá trình in dập lớp bột từ đó lên bề mặt băng tải vải (2.1) của cụm hấp bánh được dễ dàng. Tốc độ của trục tạo hình (1.6.3) cũng như băng tải vải (2.1) có thể điều chỉnh tốc độ bằng biến tần. Đường kính của bánh tráng có thể điều chỉnh bằng cách thay thế trục tạo hình (1.6.3). Độ dày của bánh tráng được điều chỉnh trực tiếp trên thiết bị nhờ điều chỉnh lớp bột dính lên các bề mặt lồi của trục tạo hình và khe hở giữa các bề mặt lồi này và bề mặt băng tải vải. Cụm hấp bánh (3) được thiết kế đảm bảo bánh chín đều và không bị tổn thất nhiệt. Bánh sau khi ra khỏi nồi hấp được làm nguội nhờ hệ thống quạt và sau đó được dao gạt lấy bánh gạt ra khỏi băng vải (2.1) và xếp lên phên lấy bánh (3.4).

abs_English: Prawn substitute food|It is an object of the present invention to provide a shrimp-like food;  It can be used as a substitute for shrimp,  and the price of shrimp is rising. Mixing starch and konjak flour,  providing cellulose,  alkaline agent and water,  heating the mixture and freezing the product;  Heating provides a shrimp substitute having a shrimp-like texture. For the use of starch;  In particular,  high amylose corn starch and/or wheat starch is preferred.
abs_Chinese: 对虾替代食品|本发明的目的是提供一种质地像虾的食品；可作为虾的替代品，虾的价格正在上涨。混合淀粉、魔芋粉，提供了纤维素、碱性剂和水、混合物的加热和产品的冷冻；加热提供了一种具有类似虾的质地的虾替代食品。用于淀粉的使用；特别是高直链淀粉的玉米淀粉和/或小麦淀粉是首选。
abs_Original: อาหารทดแทนกุ้ง|บทสรุปการประดิษฐ์ซึ่งจะปรากฏบนหน้าประกาศโฆษณา   : หน้า 1 ของจำนวน 1 หน้าบทสรุปการประดิษฐ์วัตถุประสงค์ของการประดิษฐ์นี้คือการจัดให้มีผลิตภัณฑ์อาหารที่มีเนื้อสัมผัสเหมือนกุ้งที่; สามารถถูกนำมาใช้เป็นทางเลือกให้กับกุ้งซึ่งราคาของมันกำลังเพิ่มสูงขึ้น การผสมสตาร์ช,  แป้งบุก, ; เซลลูโลส,  แอลคาไลน์เอเจนต์และน้ำ,  การให้ความร้อนของผสมและการแช่แข็งผลิตภัณฑ์ที่ถูกให้; ความร้อนจัดให้มีผลิตภัณฑ์อาหารทดแทนกุ้งที่มีเนื้อสัมผัสเหมือนกุ้ง สำหรับสตาร์ชสำหรับการใช้; โดยเฉพาะอย่างยิ่งสตาร์ชข้าวโพดที่มีอะไมโลสสูง และ/หรือสตาร์ชข้าวสาลีคือที่ควรใช้

abs_English: Sterilization food storage cabinet|The invention relates to a food preservation cabinet,  which is different in that the inner surface of the cabinet is coated with a fungicide powder coating,  wherein the fungicide powder coating contains 95-99% by weight of powder coating powder and 1-5% by weight of nano silver doped phosphite Ziricon powder (Ag/ZRP),  wherein : -the particle size of nano silver doped phosphite Ziricon powder is not greater than the average particle size of the powder coating powder;  And the amount of-nano silver is between 1% and 5% by weight of nano silver doped Ziricon phosphate powder.
abs_Chinese: 杀菌食品保鲜柜|本发明涉及一种食品保鲜柜，其不同之处在于，此柜内表面涂有杀菌剂粉末涂料，此杀菌剂粉末涂料中含有添加量为95~99%重量的粉末涂料粉和1~5%重量的纳米银掺杂亚磷酸Ziricon粉(Ag/ZRP)，其中 : -纳米银掺杂亚磷酸Ziricon粉的粒径不大于粉末涂料粉的平均粒径； 以及-纳米银的量在纳米银掺杂的Ziricon磷酸盐粉末重量的1~5%之间。
abs_Original: TỦ BẢO QUẢN THỰC PHẨM DIỆT KHUẨN|Sáng chế đề cập đến tủ bảo quản thực phẩm,  khác biệt ở chỗ,  bề mặt bên trong tủ này được phủ bằng sơn tĩnh điện diệt khuẩn,  sơn tĩnh điện diệt khuẩn này chứa bột sơn tĩnh điện với lượng từ 95 đến 99% trọng lượng và bột ziricon phosphat pha tạp nano bạc (Ag/ZrP) với lượng từ 1 đến 5% trọng lượng,  trong đó :  - bột ziricon phosphat pha tạp nano bạc có cỡ hạt không lớn hơn cỡ hạt trung bình của bột sơn tĩnh điện;  và - lượng nano bạc nằm trong khoảng từ 1 đến 5% trọng lượng của bột ziricon phosphat pha tạp nano bạc.

abs_English: Fiber arranging technology for grinding machine|Revision 29/06/58 apparatus and method for accelerating food product and reducing product pressure to stretch the product and align product fibers-An apparatus and method for accelerating food product and reducing product pressure to stretch the product and align product fibers.
abs_Chinese: 磨床用纤维排列技术|修订29/06/58加速食品产品和降低产品压力以使产品拉伸、使产品纤维排列的设备和方法-一种用于加速食品产品并降低产品压力以使产品拉伸，使产品纤维排列的装置和方法。
abs_Original:
เทคโนโลยีการจัดเรียงเส้นใยสำหรับเครื่องจักรสำหรับบด|แก้ไข 29/06/58 อุปกรณ์และวิธีการสำหรับเร่งผลิตภัณฑ์อาหารและลดแรงดันของผลิตภัณฑ์เพื่อทำให้
ผลิตภัณฑ์นั้นยืดออกทำให้เส้นใยของผลิตภัณฑ์เรียงตัว
------------------------------------- อุปกรณ์และวิธีการสำหรับเร่งผลิตภัณฑ์อาหารและลดแรงดันของผลิตภัณฑ์เพื่อทำให้
ผลิตภัณฑ์นั้นยืดออกทำให้ใยของผลิตภัณฑ์เรียงตัว

abs_English: Food additive composition,  preparation method,  kit,  feed and premix containing such food additive composition|The present invention relates to a food additive composition consisting essentially of direct feeding bacteria comprising one or more bacterial strains that bind to at least one protease. In addition,  the invention also relates to a method for preparing the food additive composition,  a prepared kit,  a feed and a premix containing the food additive composition. & LT;  Image1
abs_Chinese: 食品添加剂组合物，制备方法，试剂盒，饲料和含有此食品添加剂组合物的初制混合物|本发明涉及一种食品添加剂组合物，其基本由包含与至少一种蛋白酶结合的一个或多个细菌菌株的直接喂食细菌组成。 此外，本发明还涉及制备此食品添加剂组合物的方法，所制备的试剂盒，饲料和含有此食品添加剂组合物的预混料。&LT；Image1
abs_Original: HỢP PHẦN PHỤ GIA THỰC PHẨM,  PHƯƠNG PHÁP ĐIỀU CHẾ,  BỘ KIT,  THỨC ĂN VÀ HỖN HỢP SƠ CHẾ CHỨA HỢP PHẦN PHỤ GIA THỰC PHẨM NÀY|Sáng chế đề cập đến hợp phần phụ gia thực phẩm về cơ bản gồm có vi khuẩn cho ăn trực tiếp chứa một hoặc nhiều chủng vi khuẩn kết hợp với ít nhất là một proteaza. Ngoài ra,  sáng chế còn đề cập đến phương pháp điều chế hợp phần phụ gia thực phẩm này,  bộ kít,  thức ăn và hỗn hợp sơ chế chứa hợp phần phụ gia thực phẩm này.< Image1

abs_English: Modified wheat flour and shell-making raw materials for fried food,  and denaturation method of such wheat flour|The invention relates to a modified wheat flour for fried food processing,  which contains a heat treatment product of non-modified wheat flour,  has a RVA peak viscosity of 3500mpas,  and has a gel initiation temperature lower than that of non-modified wheat flour by at least 10oC. The initial gel temperature of undenatured wheat flour is 70O ~ 86OC. The RVA peak viscosity of undenatured wheat flour is better between 3000 ml and 5000mpas. Sea dish powder has good dispersibility in water and can be made into crisp shell fried food. In addition,  the invention also relates to a shell-making raw material for the sack fried food and a flour denaturation method for the sack fried food.
abs_Chinese: 包炒食品的变性小麦粉和制壳原料，以及这种变性小麦粉的方法|本发明涉及一种用于油炸食品加工的变性小麦粉，含有非变性小麦粉的热处理产物，其RVA峰值粘度为3500mpas，其凝胶起始温度比非变性小麦粉的凝胶起始温度至少低10oC。 未变性小麦粉的凝胶起始温度为70O~86OC为宜。 未变性小麦粉的RVA峰值粘度在3000毫升5000mpas之间较好。 海盘菜粉在水中具有良好的分散性，可制成脆壳油炸食品。 此外，本发明还涉及一种麻袋油炸食品的制壳原料，以及麻袋油炸食品的面粉变性方法。
abs_Original: BỘT MÌ BIẾN TÍNH VÀ NGUYÊN LIỆU LÀM VỎ CHO THỰC PHẨM CHIÊN BAO,  VÀ PHƯƠNG PHÁP BIẾN TÍNH BỘT MÌ NÀY|Sáng chế đề cập đến bột mì biến tính được dùng trong quá trình chế biến thực phẩm chiên bao chứa sản phẩm được xử lý nhiệt của bột mì không biến tính và có độ nhớt đỉnh RVA từ 3500 đền 7000 mPas và nhiệt độ bắt đầu gel hóa thấp hơn ít nhất 10oC so với nhiệt độ bắt đầu gel hóa của bột mì không biến tính. Bột mì không biến tính tốt hơn là có nhiệt độ bắt đầu gel hóa từ 70o đến 86oC. Bột mì không biến tính tốt hơn là có độ nhớt đỉnh RVA từ 3000 đển 5000 mPas. Bột mì biển tính có khả năng phân tán tốt trong nước và tạo ra thực phẩm chiên bao có vỏ giòn. Ngoài ra,  sáng chế cũng đề cập đến nguyên liệu làm vỏ cho thực phẩm chiên bao,  và phương pháp biến tính bột mì cho thực phẩm chiên bao.

abs_English: Composition with greasy flavor function and method for producing food or beverage thereof|The invention relates to a composition with greasy flavor function and a production method of food or beverage thereof. The invention also relates to a method for making "Kokumi" flavor original flavor for food or beverage. The original "Kokumi" flavor is transferred to food or beverages by using G-glutamyl peptides,  such as G-glutamyl-Gly,  combined with L-citric acid or adipic acid.
abs_Chinese: 具有油腻风味功能的组合物及其食品或饮料的生产方法|本发明涉及一种具有油腻风味功能的组合物及其食品或饮料的生产方法。 本发明还涉及用于为食品或饮料制作“Kokumi”风味原味的方法。 通过使用G-谷氨酰肽，如G-谷戊酰-Gly，与L-柠檬酸或己二酸结合，将原味的“Kokumi”风味传递到食品或饮料中。
abs_Original: CHẾ PHẨM CÓ CHỨC NĂNG TẠO VỊ BÉO NGẬY VÀ PHƯƠNG PHÁP SẢN XUẤT THỰC PHẨM HOẶC ĐỒ UỐNG|Sáng chế đề cập đến chế phẩm có chức năng tạo vị béo ngậy và phương pháp sản xuất thực phẩm hoặc đồ uống. Sáng chế cũng đề cập đến phương pháp để tạo vị "kokumi" kiểu vị ban đầu cho thực phẩm hoặc đồ uống. Bằng cách sử dụng g-glutamyl peptit,  như g-Glu-Val-Gly,  kết hợp với axit L-tatric hoặc axit adipic,  vị "kokumi" kiểu vị ban đầu được truyền cho thực phẩm hoặc đồ uống.

abs_English: A pet food contains processed waxy kazawa starch.|New revision 26/9/2560 a pet food consisting of a base material made of meat or meat byproducts. Also provided is an Akvius phase formed by assembling a waxy Kazawa in Hibitted starch,  the waxy Kazawa being acetyl substituted in Hibitted starch to enhance the toughness of the Akvius phase. Also provided is a gravy for a pet food,  the gravy comprising a combination of acetyl-substituted waxy Kazawa in Hibitted starch,  the result of which is toughening of the composition. It has stability against freezing/thawing in excess of about five cycles. In addition,  it is provided to a pet dog or cat by feeding the pet dog or cat with a gravy comprising hydroxypropyl substituted waxy Kazawa Hibitted starch in an amount of less than about 2.5% by weight of the hydroxypropyl substituent,  resulting in toughening of the Akvius phase at such a dose.
abs_Chinese: 宠物食品，含有加工过的蜡状卡扎瓦淀粉。|新修订26/9/2560由肉类或肉类副产品制成的基本材料组成的宠物食品。还提供了一种由蜡质卡泽瓦在Hibited淀粉组装而成的Akvius相，该蜡泽瓦在Hibited淀粉中被乙酰取代，以提高Akvius相的增韧性。还提供了：一种用于宠物食品的肉汁，该肉汁由含有乙酰基取代的蜡状Kazawa in Hibited淀粉组合而成，其结果是该组合物的增韧。它对冷冻/解冻的稳定性超过了大约5次循环。此外，它还提供给宠物狗或猫的喂食方法是：宠物食品用肉汁，含有羟丙基取代的蜡状Kazawa Hibited淀粉，其含量低于羟丙基取代剂重量的约2.5%，在这样一个剂量下，导致Akvius相的增韧。
abs_Original: อาหารสัตว์เลี้ยงซึ่งมีแวกซี่คาซาวาสตาร์ชชนิดแปรรูป|แก้ไขใหม่ 26/9/2560          องค์ประกอบอาหารสัตว์เลี้ยงซึ่งประกอบรวมด้วยวัสดุพื้นเนื้อที่ประกอบรวมด้วยเนื้อ หรือผลผลิตพลอยได้ของเนื้อ และแอคเควียสเฟสที่ประกอบรวมด้วยแวกซี่คาซาวาอินฮิบิเทดสตาร์ชที่มีการแทนที่ด้วยแอซีทิลในปริมาณที่ยังผลเพื่อทำให้เกิดการเหนียวขึ้นของแอคเควียสเฟสดังกล่าวได้ถูกให้ไว้ ที่ยังให้ไว้คือ น้ำเกรวี่สำหรับอาหารสัตว์เลี้ยงซึ่งประกอบรวมด้วยแวกซี่คาซาวาอินฮิบิเทดสตาร์ชที่มีการแทนที่ด้วยแอซีทิลในปริมาณที่ยังผลเพื่อทำให้เกิดการเหนียวขึ้นขององค์ประกอบดังกล่าว และซึ่งมีความเสถียรต่อการแช่แข็ง/ละลายที่มากกว่าประมาณ 5 รอบ ตลอดจนวิธีของการให้อาหารแก่สัตว์เลี้ยงพวกสุนัข หรือพวกแมว ที่ยังให้ไว้คือ น้ำเกรวี่สำหรับอาหารสัตว์เลี้ยงที่ประกอบรวมด้วยแวกซี่คาซาวาอินฮิบิเทดสตาร์ชที่มีการแทนที่ด้วยไฮดรอกซีโพรพิลซึ่งมีน้อยกว่าประมาณ2.5%,  โดยน้ำหนักของตัวแทนที่ด้วยไฮดรอกซีโพรพิล,  ในปริมาณที่ยังผลเพื่อทำให้เกิดการเหนียวขึ้นของแอคเควียสเฟสดังกล่าว

abs_English: Flavoring tablets or broths used in cooking and methods for reducing solidification of flavoring tablets or broths|The invention relates to a seasoning tablet or broth as a cooking additive,  which is used for making food products used in cooking. A flavored tablet or broth comprising salt,  oil and/or fat and flavoring agents used in cooking,  characterized in that the tablet further comprises 1% to 25% of grain bran by dry mass. In addition,  the invention also relates to a method for reducing the hard chemistry of condiment tablets or broths.
abs_Chinese: 烹调中使用的调味片剂或肉汤以及减少调味片剂或肉汤硬化的方法|本发明涉及一种作为烹调添加剂的调味片或肉汤，用于制作烹调中使用的食品产品。 一种调味片或肉汤，包括盐，油和/或脂肪以及烹调中使用的调味剂，其特征在于，这种片还包括占干质量的1%至25%的谷物麸皮。 此外，本发明还涉及一种降低调味品片剂或肉汤的硬化学性的方法。
abs_Original: VIÊN NÉN GIA VỊ HOẶC NƯỚC DÙNG DÙNG TRONG NẤU ĂN VÀ PHƯƠNG PHÁP LÀM GIẢM SỰ HÓA CỨNG CỦA VIÊN NÉN GIA VỊ HOẶC NƯỚC DÙNG|Sáng chế đề cập đến viên nén gia vị hoặc nước dùng được sử dụng làm phụ gia nấu ăn để chế biến các sản phẩm thực phẩm dùng trong nấu ăn. Viên nén gia vị hoặc nước dùng bao gồm muối,  dầu và/hoặc chất béo và chất tạo hương vị dùng trong nấu ăn,  đặc trưng ở chỗ viên nén còn bao gồm cám ngũ cốc chiếm 1 đến 25% khối lượng khô. Ngoài ra,  sáng chế đề cập đến phương pháp làm giảm sự hóa cứng của viên nén gia vị hoặc nước dùng.

abs_English: Production process of nutritious food and nutritious food obtained by the process|The invention relates to a method for producing nutritious food from flour raw material sources,  wherein the method comprises the following steps :  (a) preparing raw materials;  (b) sieve out that impurity mixture,  cooking at a temperature of 85 to 100 C for 10 to 15 minute,  then pulverizing,  and collecting the liquid mixture;  (c) enzymatic hydrolysis;  And (d) the collection of nutritious food. In addition,  the invention also relates to a method for producing nutritious food from fresh raw material sources,  a method for producing vegetarian nutritious food and nutritious food obtained by these methods.
abs_Chinese: 营养食品的生产工艺及通过该工艺得到的营养食品|本发明涉及一种由面粉原料来源生产营养食品的方法，其中，该方法包括以下步骤 : (a)制备原料； (b)筛除杂质混合物，在85~100°C的温度下蒸煮10~15分钟，然后进行粉碎，收集液体混合物； (c)酶水解； 以及(d)收集营养食品。此外，本发明还涉及从新鲜原料来源生产营养食品的方法，素食营养食品的生产方法以及通过这些方法获得的营养食品。
abs_Original: QUY TRÌNH SẢN XUẤT THỰC PHẨM DINH DƯỠNG VÀ THỰC PHẨM DINH DƯỠNG THU ĐƯỢC BẰNG QUY TRÌNH NÀY|Sáng chế đề cập đến quy trình sản xuất thực phẩm dinh dưỡng từ nguồn nguyên liệu bột,  trong đó quy trình này bao gồm các bước :  (a) chuẩn bị nguyên liệu;  (b) rây hỗn hợp loại bỏ tạp chất,  nấu ở nhiệt độ từ 85 đến 100°C trong thời gian từ 10 đến 15 phút,  sau đó đem nghiền thu hỗn hợp dạng lỏng;  (c) thủy phân enzym;  và (d) thu thực phẩm dinh dưỡng.Ngoài ra,  sáng chế còn đề cập đến quy trình sản xuất thực phẩm dinh dưỡng từ nguồn nguyên liệu tươi,  quy trình sản xuất thực phẩm dinh dưỡng dành cho người ăn chay và thực phẩm dinh dưỡng thu được bằng các quy trình này.

abs_English: Iron composite fortified soup powder tablet,  ready-to-eat food containing the soup powder tablet and preparation process thereof|The invention relates to a method comprising,  30 to 70 wt% NaCl,  10 to 45 wt% monosodium glutamate,  and at least one iron compound of group III EDTA iron sodium,  reduced iron III,  iron lactate III,  iron citrate III,  iron pyrophosphate III,  iron sulfate monohydrate III,  iron citrate III and brown iron III in an amount such that Fe2 + and/or Fe3 + in the soup powder are at least 0.01 wt% and not more than 2%,  preferably at least 0.025 wt% and not more than 1.6%,  preferably at least 0.05 wt% and not more than 1 wt%,  based on the weight of the soup powder. In addition,  the invention also relates to an instant food containing the soup powder tablets and a preparation method thereof.
abs_Chinese: 铁复合强化汤粉，含这种汤粉的即食食品及其制备工艺|本发明涉及一种含有， 以汤粉的重量计算 :  重量为30~70%的NaCl， 谷氨酸单钠重量为10至45%， 还含有至少一种III族EDTA铁钠的铁化合物， 还原铁III，乳酸铁III，柠檬酸铁III，焦磷酸铁III，一水硫酸铁III，柠檬酸铁III，棕褐色铁III，其用量使汤粉中的Fe2+和/或Fe3+至少0.01%wt%和不超过2%，优选至少0.025%wt%和不超过1.6%，优选至少0.05%wt%和不超过1%wt%。 此外，本发明还涉及含有这种汤粉片的即食食品及其制备方法。
abs_Original: VIÊN BỘT CANH ĐƯỢC TĂNG CƯỜNG HỢP CHẤT SẮT,  THỰC PHẨM ĂN LIỀN CHỨA VIÊN BỘT CANH NÀY VÀ QUY TRÌNH ĐIỀU CHẾ CHÚNG|Sáng chế đề cập đến viên bột canh chứa,  tính theo trọng lượng của viên bột canh :  NaCl từ 30 đến 70% trọng lượng,  mononatri glutamat từ 10 đến 45% trọng lượng,  còn chứa ít nhất một hợp chất sắt của nhóm natri sắt III EDTA,  sắt III bị khử,  lactat sắt II,  xitrat sắt III,  pyrophotphat sắt III,  monohydrat sunphat sắt II,  amoni xitrat sắt III màu nâu,  với một lượng sao cho viên bột canh chứa lượng tính gộp Fe2+ và/hoặc Fe3+ từ ít nhất là 0, 01% trọng lượng và không quá 2% trọng lượng,  tốt hơn là từ ít nhất là 0, 025% trọng lượng và không quá 1, 6% trọng lượng,  tốt hơn nữa là,  từ ít nhất là 0, 05% trọng lượng và không quá 1% trọng lượng,  tính theo trọng lượng của viên bột canh. Ngoài ra,  sáng chế còn đề cập đến thực phẩm ăn liền chứa viên bột canh này và quy trình điều chế chúng.

abs_English: Lactobacillus aerated Lactobacillus producing lactobacillus,  therapeutic food containing Lactobacillus aerated Lactobacillus aerated Lactobacillus aerated Lactobacillus aerated Lactobacillus aerated Lactobacillus aerated Lactobacillus aerated Lactobacillus aerated Lactobacillus aerated|The invention relates to a lactic acid bacterium acid-producing bacterium Gasseri strain OLL2922 and a dietary food containing the bacterium,  which is used for inhibiting the increase of blood uric acid content,  preventing and/or treating hyperuricemia or inhibiting purine absorption. In addition,  the invention also relates to a method for producing dietary food with reduced purine level by using the lactic acid-producing bacteria.
abs_Chinese: 产乳酸菌乳酸杆菌gasseri，含此菌抑制血尿酸含量升高，预防和/或治疗高尿酸血症或抑制嘌呤吸收的膳食食品和生产嘌呤水平降低的膳食食品的方法|本发明涉及乳酸菌产酸菌Gasseri菌株OLL2922及含此菌的膳食食品，用于抑制血尿酸含量升高，预防和/或治疗高尿酸血症或抑制嘌呤吸收。 此外，本发明还涉及一种利用这种产乳酸菌生产嘌呤水平降低的膳食食品的方法。
abs_Original: VI KHUẨN SINH AXIT LACTIC LACTOBACILLUS GASSERI,  THỰC PHẨM ĂN KIÊNG CHỨA VI KHUẨN NÀY ĐỂ ỨC CHẾ SỰ TĂNG HÀM LƯỢNG AXIT URIC MÁU,  NGĂN NGỪA VÀ/HOẶC ĐIỀU TRỊ CHỨNG TĂNG AXIT URIC MÁU HOẶC ỨC CHẾ SỰ HẤP THỤ PURIN VÀ PHƯƠNG PHÁP SẢN XUẤT THỰC PHẨM ĂN KIÊNG CÓ MỨC PURIN GIẢM|Sáng chế đề cập đến vi khuẩn sinh axit lactic Lactobacillus gasseri chủng OLL2922 và thực phẩm ăn kiêng chứa vi khuẩn này để ức chế sự tăng hàm lượng axit uric máu,  ngăn ngừa và/hoặc điều trị chứng tăng axit uric máu hoặc ức chế sự hấp thụ purin. Ngoài ra,  sáng chế còn đề cập đến phương pháp sản xuất thực phẩm ăn kiêng có mức purin giảm bằng cách sử dụng vi khuẩn sinh axit lactic này.

abs_English: Oily food and production method of oily food|The invention relates to an oil-type food containing low amounts of saturated fatty acids and trans fatty acids,  good shape retention and low adhesion,  in particular to an oil-type food containing cocoa butter and good taste. The present invention provides an oil food containing fat,  oil and sugar,  wherein the amount of saturated fatty acid is 45% by mass or less of the total amount of fatty acid constituting the fat and oil,  and the amount of trans fatty acid is 5% or less by mass of the total amount of fatty acid constituting the fat and oil. Oil foods containing sugar skeleton circuits. The L3 content of grease food is less than 10% mass fraction of fat and grease. The invention also relates to a production method of the oil-type food.
abs_Chinese: 油型食品及油型食品的生产方法|本发明涉及含低量饱和脂肪酸和反式脂肪酸且保形性好，粘附性低的油型食品，具体是指含可可脂且口感良好的油型食品。 本发明提出一种含脂肪和油，糖类的油脂食品，使饱和脂肪酸的量为构成脂肪和油的脂肪酸总量的45%质量以下，反式脂肪酸的量为构成脂肪和油的脂肪酸总量的5%质量以下。 含糖骨架电路的油类食品。 油脂类食品的L3含量为脂肪和油脂的10%质量分数以下。 本发明还涉及上述油型食品的生产方法。
abs_Original: THỰC PHẨM DẠNG DẦU VÀ PHƯƠNG PHÁP SẢN XUẤT THỰC PHẨM DẠNG DẦU|Sáng chế đề cập đến thực phẩm dạng dầu chứa một lượng thấp của axit béo bão hòa và axit béo trans và có khả năng giữ hình dạng tốt và độ dính thấp,  và cụ thể,  thực phẩm dạng dầu chứa bơ cacao và có hương vị ngon. Sáng chế đề xuất thực phẩm dạng dầu chứa chất béo và dầu và sacarit sao cho lượng axit béo bão hòa là 45% khối lượng hoặc ít hơn so với tổng lượng axit béo cấu thành chất béo và dầu,  và lượng axit béo trans là 5% khối lượng hoặc ít hơn so với tổng lượng axit béo cấu thành chất béo và dầu. Thực phẩm dạng dầu có mạch khung đường. Hàm lượng L3 của thực phẩm dạng dầu là 10% khối lượng hoặc ít hơn so với chất béo và dầu. Sáng chế còn đề cập đến phương pháp sản xuất thực phẩm dạng dầu nêu trên.

abs_English: Chocolate,  food coated with chocolate and method of making chocolate|The invention relates to a chocolate manufacturing method and a food using chocolate,  which have the opposite characteristics of difficult separation during coating and rapid drying at conventional temperatures. In addition,  the invention relates to chocolate having a water content of between 0.8 and 3% by mass and a viscosity of between 10, 000 and 35, 000 cps at a temperature of 50oC. The solid fat content (SFC) of fat in chocolate is between 70% and 100% at 10oC,  50% and 100% at 25oC and 0% and 25% at 35oC.
abs_Chinese: 巧克力，涂有巧克力的食品和制造巧克力的方法|本发明涉及一种具有在涂布过程中不易分离和在传统温度下快速干燥的相反特性的巧克力制造方法和使用巧克力的食品。 此外，本发明涉及在50oC温度下，含水量在0.8~3%质量之间，粘度在10, 000~35, 000 cps之间的巧克力。 巧克力中油脂的固体脂肪含量(SFC)在10oC温度下介于70~100%，25oC温度下介于50~100%，35oC温度下介于0~25%。
abs_Original: SÔCÔLA,  THỰC PHẨM ĐƯỢC PHỦ SÔCÔLA VÀ PHƯƠNG PHÁP SẢN XUẤT SÔCÔLA|Sáng chế đề cập đến quy trình sản xuất sôcôla có các đặc tính trái ngược gồm không dễ dàng tách ra và khô nhanh tại nhiệt độ thông thường trong suốt quá trình phủ và thực phẩm sử dụng sôcôla. Ngoài ra,  sáng chế đề cập đến sôcôla có hàm lượng nước nằm trong khoảng từ 0, 8 đến 3% khối lượng và độ nhớt nằm trong khoảng từ 10.000 đến 35.000 cps ở nhiệt độ 50oC. Hàm lượng chất béo dạng rắn (SFC) của chất béo dầu trong sôcôla nằm trong khoảng từ 70 đến 100% ở nhiệt độ 10oC,  từ 50 đến 100% ở nhiệt độ 25oC,  và từ 0 đến 25% ở nhiệt độ 35oC.

abs_English: Fried food,  fried food and fried food processing methods are used for powder sprinkling mixtures.|The invention provides a powder sprinkling mixture for frying food,  which contains waxy potato starch. The content of waxy potato starch should be 20 ~ 80% by mass. Preferably,  the powder sprinkling mixture also contains 10 to 80% by mass of starch other than waxy potato starch. Preferably,  the powder dispersing mixture contains 0.1 to 3% by mass of the powder dispersing agent. Waxy potato starch should have amylopectin content equal to or higher than 85% by mass. The invention also provides a fried food and a processing method of fried food,  which comprises the steps of continuously coating a food substrate with powder sprinkling and powder coating and frying the coated and powdered food substrate.
abs_Chinese: 油炸食品，油炸食品和油炸食品加工方法用混合粉撒布|本发明提出了一种用于油炸食品的撒粉混合物，其中含有蜡质马铃薯淀粉。 蜡质马铃薯淀粉含量以20~80%质量分数为宜。 优选地，撒粉混合物中还含有除蜡质马铃薯淀粉以外的10~80%质量分数的淀粉。 优选地，撒粉混合物中含有0.1~3%质量分数的撒粉剂。 蜡质马铃薯淀粉以支链淀粉含量等于或高于85%质量分数为宜。 本发明还提出了一种油炸食品和油炸食品的加工方法，其包括用撒粉和涂粉连续涂覆食品基质和将涂覆和涂粉的食品基质油炸的步骤。
abs_Original: HỖN HỢP BỘT RẮC CHO THỰC PHẨM CHIÊN,  THỰC PHẨM CHIÊN VÀ PHƯƠNG PHÁP CHẾ BIẾN THỰC PHẨM CHIÊN|Sáng chế đề xuất hỗn hợp bột rắc cho thực phẩm chiên chứa tinh bột khoai tây sáp. Hàm lượng tinh bột khoai tây sáp tốt hơn là nằm trong khoảng từ 20 đến 80% khối lượng. Tốt hơn là,  hỗn hợp bột rắc còn chứa từ 10 đến 80% khối lượng của tinh bột khác với tinh bột khoai tây sáp. Tốt hơn là,  hỗn hợp bột rắc chứa từ 0, 1 đến 3% khối lượng của chất làm nở bột. Tinh bột khoai tây sáp tốt hơn là có hàm lượng amylopectin bằng hoặc cao hơn 85% khối lượng. Sáng chế còn đề xuất thực phẩm chiên và phương pháp chế biến thực phẩm chiên bao gồm bước phủ chất nền thực phẩm liên tục bằng bột rắc và lớp phủ và chiên chất nền thực phẩm thức ăn đã được phủ và rắc bột.

abs_English: Method for cooking energy-saving food on a stove|The invention relates to a method for cooking energy-saving food on an induction cooker. The method comprises the following steps :  heating the food with an induction cooker,  automatically identifying when the food is boiled and automatically stopping boiling,  automatically timing,  automatically repeating the boiling of the food after 15 minutes until the boiling is automatically stopped,  and continuing to repeat automatically as required until the food is boiled. & 1;  Image1
abs_Chinese: 法国用炉子煮节能食品|本发明涉及一种在电磁炉上烹调节能食品的方法。 该方法包括以下步骤 : 用电磁炉加热食物，自动识别食物何时煮沸自动停止煮沸，自动定时，在15分钟后自动重复食物煮沸至煮沸后自动停止煮沸，继续按要求自动重复，直至食物煮沸。&1；Image1
abs_Original: PHUƠNG PHÁP NẤU NHỪ THỨC ĂN TIẾT KIỆM NĂNG LƯỢNG TRÊN BẾP TỪ|Sáng chế đề cập đến phương pháp nấu nhừ thức ăn tiết kiệm năng lượng trên bếp từ. Phương pháp này bao gồm các bước :  sử dụng bếp từ để đun nóng thức ăn,  tự động nhận biết khi thức ăn được đun sôi để tự động dừng đun,  tự động định thời gian để sau 15 phút tự động lặp lại quá trình đun thức ăn tới khi sôi thì tự động dừng đun,  cứ tiếp tục tự động lặp lại như vậy cho tới khi thức ăn được nấu nhừ theo yêu cầu.< Image1

abs_English: Product generating means,  preferably a food product which is prepared into a beverage by formulation in a corresponding liquid|The invention relates to a device (10) for producing products,  preferably food products,  for producing beverages by formulation in corresponding liquids,  preferably water,  especially hot water;  This product is composed of corresponding particles or raw materials,  i.e. Powder,  sand,  lumps,  etc.,  for example,  roasted and ground coffee;  The apparatus comprises support means (12) for means (14) for generating a corresponding product starting from a predetermined portion of the raw material or a corresponding measuring portion,  the means (14) comprising means (16) for aggregating particles of the predetermined portion of the raw material.
abs_Chinese: 产品生成装置，优选为食品产品，用于通过在相应液体中进行调配而制成饮料|本发明涉及用于生产产品的装置(10)，优选为食品产品，用于通过在优选为水，特别是热水的相应液体中配制而生产饮料； 本品是由相应的颗粒组成或制成的原料，即粉状，沙粒，块状等，例如，烘焙和磨碎的咖啡； 该装置包括用于装置(14)的支撑装置(12)，用于从原料的预定部分或相应测量部分开始生成相应产品，这些装置(14)包括用于使原料的该预定部分的颗粒团聚的装置(16)。
abs_Original: THIẾT BỊ TẠO SẢN PHẨM,  ĐƯỢC ƯU TIÊN LÀ SẢN PHẨM THỰC PHẨM ĐỂ PHA ĐỒ UỐNG BẰNG CÁCH PHA CHẾ TRONG CHẤT LỎNG TƯƠNG ỨNG|Sáng chế đề cập đến thiết bị (10) để tạo ra sản phẩm,  được ưu tiên là sản phẩm thực phẩm để tạo ra đồ uống bằng cách pha chế trong chất lỏng tương ứng,  được ưu tiên là nước,  đặc biệt là nước nóng;  sản phẩm này là thu được từ nguyên liệu thô bao gồm hoặc được tạo ra từ các hạt tương ứng,  cụ thể là dạng bột,  hột,  miếng,  v.v.,  ví dụ,  của cà phê rang và xay;  thiết bị này bao gồm các phương tiện đỡ (12) dành cho các phương tiện (14) để tạo ra các sản phẩm tương ứng bắt đầu từ phần định trước hoặc phần được đo tương ứng của nguyên liệu thô,  các phương tiện (14) này bao gồm các phương tiện (16) để làm kết tụ các hạt của phần định trước này của nguyên liệu thô.

abs_English: Edible fiber preparation derived from cassava powder and food containing the same|The invention relates to an edible fiber composition,  which is derived from cassava powder,  and the cassava powder contains edible fiber with a total dosage of 35-60% by weight and starch with a dosage of 30-50% by weight calculated by dry solid amount. The invention also relates to food containing the composition.
abs_Chinese: 木薯粉衍生的食用纤维制剂及含此制剂的食品|本发明涉及一种可食用纤维组合物，该组合物来源于木薯粉，所述木薯粉含有总用量为35~60%重量的可食用纤维和按干固量计算的用量为30~50%重量的淀粉。 本发明还涉及含有此组合物的食品。
abs_Original: CHẾ PHẨM CHẤT XƠ ĂN ĐƯỢC CÓ NGUỒN GỐC TỪ BỘT SẮN VÀ THỰC PHẨM CHỨA CHẾ PHẨM NÀY|Sáng chế đề cập đến chế phẩm chất xơ ăn được có nguồn gốc từ bột sắn chứa chất xơ ăn được với tổng lượng nằm trong khoảng từ 35 đến 60% trọng lượng và tinh bột với lượng nằm trong khoảng từ 30 đến 50% trọng lượng,  tính theo lượng chất rắn khô. Sáng chế còn đề cập đến thực phẩm chứa chế phẩm này.

abs_English: Flavor enhancer composition,  fragments having flavor activity,  process for preparing such fragments,  and food containing them|The invention relates to a flavoring composition containing at least a flavoring compound,  wherein the composition (a) is capable of passing through an ultrafiltration membrane having a molecular weight threshold of 250kDa,  (b) is mainly free of lycopene EN,  (c) contains a compound less than 250kDa,  and (d) is capable of flavoring. In addition,  the invention also relates to active tomato participles containing these compositions. This segment and the above composition are suitable for manufacturing food products.
abs_Chinese: 鲜味增感制剂，鲜味活性段，这种段的制备方法和含有它们的食品|本发明涉及一种至少含有增鲜味化合物的增鲜味组合物，其中该组合物(a)能够通过分子量阈值为250kDa的超滤膜，(b)主要不含番茄红素EN，(c)含有小于250kDa的化合物，(d)能够增鲜味。 此外，本发明还涉及含有这些组合物的活性番茄分词。 这种分段和上述组合物适于制造食品产品。
abs_Original: CHẾ PHẨM TĂNG VỊ UMAMI,  PHÂN ĐOẠN CÓ HOẠT TÍNH UMAMI,  PHƯƠNG PHÁP ĐIỀU CHẾ PHÂN ĐOẠN NÀY VÀ THỰC PHẨM CHỨA CHÚNG|Sáng chế đề cập đến chế phẩm tăng vị umami chứa ít nhất là một hợp chất tăng vị umami,  trong đó chế phẩm này (a) có khả năng đi qua màng siêu lọc có ngưỡng khối lượng phân tử 250 kDa,  (b) chủ yếu không có lycopen,  (c) chứa một hợp chất nhỏ hơn 250kDa,  và (d) có khả năng tăng vị umami. Ngoài ra,  sáng chế còn đề cập đến phân đoạn từ cà chua hoạt tính chứa các chế phẩm này. Các phân đoạn như vậy và các chế phẩm nêu trên là thích hợp để sản xuất các sản phẩm thực phẩm.

abs_English: Sweeteners,  compositions containing sweeteners,  and methods for producing sweetness of compositions using such sweeteners|The invention relates to a sweetener and a sweetener method for oral administration or composition for oral cavity by improving the sweetness of stevia extract. The invention also provides a sweetener,  which can be prepared by compounding stevia A,  the main sweetening component of stevia rebaudiana extract,  and mullite V,  the main sweetening component of Siraitia grosvenorii extract,  with a weight ratio of 95 :  5 to 60 :  40. By using the above composition as a sweetener,  various products such as food,  medicine and the like can have appropriate sweetness.
abs_Chinese: 甜味剂，含有该甜味剂的组合物和用该甜味剂使组合物产生甜味的方法|本发明涉及一种通过提高甜菊提取物的甜味度而经口给药或用于口腔的组合物的甜味剂和甜味剂方法。 本发明还提出了一种甜味剂，可由甜叶菊提取物的主要甜味成分甜叶菊酯A与罗汉果提取物的主要甜味成分莫来石V复配而成，重量比在95 : 5~60 : 40之间。 通过将上述组合物用作甜味剂，可以使各种产品如食品，药品等具有适当的甜味。
abs_Original: CHẤT TẠO NGỌT,  CHẾ PHẨM CHỨA CHẤT TẠO NGỌT VÀ PHƯƠNG PHÁP TẠO RA VỊ NGỌT CHO CHẾ PHẨM BẰNG CHẤT TẠO NGỌT NÀY|Sáng chế đề cập đến chất tạo ngọt và phương pháp tạo vị ngọt cho chế phẩm được dùng qua đường miệng hoặc được sử dụng cho khoang miệng bằng cách cải thiện độ ngọt của dịch chiết stevia. Sáng chế cũng đề xuất chất tạo ngọt có thể được điều chế bằng cách kết hợp rebaudiosit A,  là thành phần ngọt chính của dịch chiết stevia,  với mogrosit V,  là thành phần ngọt chính của dịch chiết quả La Hán,  với tỷ lệ theo trọng lượng nằm trong khoảng từ 95 : 5 đến 60 : 40. Bằng cách sử dụng chế phẩm nêu trên làm chất tạo ngọt,  có thể đem lại độ ngọt thích hợp cho các sản phẩm khác nhau như thực phẩm,  thuốc hoặc các dạng tương tự.

abs_English: A process for preparing coconut meat film and its derivative compounds.|Modified abstract 7/3/2559 of the present invention,  an improved process for preparing coconut meat-centered compositions and films;  The present invention relates to a process for preparing compositions and films comprising coconut meat;  It mainly includes fresh portion,  i.e. It is improved and improved,  and is made up by using coconut meat through a certain preparation process. It is mainly added into other fruits and vegetables in the form of flavouring and additive. These films made primarily of coconut meat may be used in the form of sheets,  rolls,  and/or packages,  typically;  For packaging any type of food such as fresh fruits,  vegetables,  salads or cooked meat/fish;  Any mixture thereof or the like,  immediately after which it is rolled up,  folded and eaten at dinner;  Or as snack. Compositions and films consisting essentially of tender coconut meat;  Freshness,  high nutrition,  no gluten,  no cholesterol,  no processing,  and no application. Animals,  low carbohydrate,  salt-free,  is beneficial to the health of the human body. In addition,  a portion;  Assembling,  sticking film,  prefetching,  steaming,  frying,  baking,  and optionally;  Maintaining a fresh state for twelve (12) months or more without using a chemical preservative;  Revising abstract 5/02/2016 of the present invention,  the present invention relates to a process for preparing compositions and films comprising coconut meat;  It mainly includes fresh portion,  i.e. It is improved and improved,  and is made up by using coconut meat through a certain preparation process. It is mainly added into other fruits and vegetables in the form of flavouring and additive. These films made primarily of coconut meat may be used in the form of sheets,  rolls,  and/or packages,  typically;  For packaging any type of food such as fresh fruits,  vegetables,  salads or cooked meat/fish;  Any mixture thereof or the like,  immediately after which it is rolled up,  folded and eaten at dinner;  Or as snack. Compositions and films consisting essentially of tender coconut meat;  Freshness,  high nutrition,  no gluten,  no cholesterol,  no processing,  and no application. Animals,  low carbohydrate,  salt-free,  is beneficial to the health of the human body. In addition,  a portion;  Assembling,  sticking film,  prefetching,  steaming,  frying,  baking,  and optionally;  Maintaining a fresh state for twelve (12) months or more without using a chemical preservative;  The present invention relates to a process for the preparation of films and compounds obtained from fresh coconut meat comprising the steps of :  Alternatively,  it consists essentially of coconut meat and other fruits and vegetables are added to different flavorings and films;  Compounds extracted from these coconut meat can be used as kelly cakes for crimping or winding,  as in;  Winding fresh fruit,  vegetable,  salad,  cooked meat or fish and a mixture of such foods on a roll;  It can be eaten during meal or as snack. Films and compounds extracted from fresh coconut meat contain substantial amounts of nutrients. No;  Contains gluten,  no cholesterol,  natural and low carbohydrate,  and no salt,  and is beneficial to human health. In addition,  films and compounds obtained from fresh coconut meat can be directly eaten,  Toasted,  steamed,  fried and Toasted to keep fresh;  New 12 months or longer without chemicals to preserve.
abs_Chinese: 椰子肉制备膜及其衍生化合物的研制过程。|修订了本发明摘要7/3/2559，制备以椰子肉为核心的组合物和薄膜的改进工艺；本发明是关于制备含有椰子肉的组合物和薄膜的方法；其中主要包括新鲜的部分，即是改良和改良的，它由椰子肉复合而成；主要是以调味品和添加剂的形式添加到其他果蔬中的，成分和；这些主要由椰子肉制成的薄膜可以以薄片、卷和/或包裹的形式使用，通常；用于包装任何类型的食品，如新鲜水果、蔬菜、沙拉或熟肉/鱼等；其任何混合物等，在此之后立即卷起，折叠并在进餐时食用；或作为零食吃。成分和薄膜，主要由嫩椰子肉组成；新鲜，含有高营养，不含面筋，不含胆固醇，不加工，不使用来自；动物，低碳水化合物，不含盐，对人体健康有益。此外，部分；拼装、贴膜也可即食、预取、蒸煮、油炸、烤制，根据需要，还；在不使用化学防腐剂的情况下，可保持十二(12)个月或更长时间的新鲜状态；修订了本发明摘要5/02/2016，本发明涉及制备含有椰子肉的组合物和薄膜的方法；其中主要包括新鲜的部分，即是改良和改良的，它由椰子肉复合而成；主要是以调味品和添加剂的形式添加到其他果蔬中的，成分和；这些主要由椰子肉制成的薄膜可以以薄片、卷和/或包裹的形式使用，通常；用于包装任何类型的食品，如新鲜水果、蔬菜、沙拉或熟肉/鱼等；其任何混合物等，在此之后立即卷起，折叠并在进餐时食用；或作为零食吃。成分和薄膜，主要由嫩椰子肉组成；新鲜，含有高营养，不含面筋，不含胆固醇，不加工，不使用来自；动物，低碳水化合物，不含盐，对人体健康有益。此外，部分；拼装、贴膜也可即食、预取、蒸煮、油炸、烤制，根据需要，还；在不使用化学防腐剂的情况下，可保持十二(12)个月或更长时间的新鲜状态；本发明涉及一种从新鲜椰子肉中获得的薄膜和化合物的制备方法，包括改进和；改变，主要由椰子肉组成，其他水果和蔬菜被添加到不同的调味剂和薄膜中；从这些椰子肉中提取的化合物可以用作可丽饼，用于卷曲或缠绕，这是在；将新鲜水果、蔬菜、沙拉、熟肉或鱼等食品和此类食品的混合物缠绕在卷上；在餐中食用或作为零食食用。从新鲜椰子肉中提取的薄膜和化合物含有大量的营养物质。不；含麸质，不含胆固醇，天然，低碳水化合物，不加盐，对人体健康有益；此外，从新鲜椰子肉中获得的薄膜和化合物，可以直接食用，烤、蒸、炒、烤，保持新鲜；新的12个月或更长的时间，没有化学物质来保存。
abs_Original: กระบวนการพัฒนาการเตรียมฟิล์มและสารประกอบที่ได้จากเนื้อมะพร้าว|แก้ไขบทสรุปการประดิษฐ์ 7/3/2559 กระบวนการที่ปรับปรุงแล้วในการจัดเตรียมส่วนประกอบและแผ่นฟิล์มที่มีเนื้อมะพร้าวเป็นหลัก; การประดิษฐ์นี้เกี่ยวกับกระบวนการในการจัดเตรียมส่วนประกอบและแผ่นฟิล์มที่มีเนื้อมะพร้าว; สดเป็นหลักซึ่งรวมถึงส่วนที่เป็น การปรับปรุงและการดัดแปลงของมันซึ่งประกอบรวมด้วยเนื้อมะพร้าว; เป็นหลัก โดยที่ผลไม้และผักอื่นๆ จะถูกเติมเข้าไปในรูปเครื่องปรุงรสและสารปรุงแต่ง ส่วนประกอบและ; แผ่นฟิล์มที่มีเนื้อมะพร้าวเป็นหลักเหล่านี้สามารถใช้ในรูป เครป,  แผ่นม้วน และ/หรือห่อหุ้มซึ่งมักจะ; ถูกใช้ในการห่อหุ้มอาหารชนิดใดๆ เช่น ผลไม้ที่สดใหม่,  ผัก,  สลัด หรือเนื้อสัตว์/ปลาที่ปรุงสุกและการ; ผสมผสานใดๆ ของมัน เป็นต้น ซึ่งหลังจากนี้จะถูกม้วน,  พับและรับประทานทันทีในระหว่างมื้ออาหาร; หรือทานเป็นของว่าง ส่วนประกอบและแผ่นฟิล์มซึ่งโดยส่วนใหญ่แล้วประกอบด้วยเนื้อมะพร้าวอ่อนที่; สดจะมีสารอาหารที่มีคุณค่าสูง,  ไม่มีกลูเตน,  ไม่มีคอเลสเตอรอล,  ไม่ผ่านกรรมวิธี,  ไม่ใช้ผลิตภัณฑ์จาก; สัตว์,  มีคาโบไฮเดรตต่ำ,  ไม่เติมเกลือและมีคุณประโยชน์สำหรับสุขภาพของมนุษย์ นอกจากนี้ ส่วน; ประกอบและแผ่นฟิล์มยังสามารถรับประทานได้ทันที,  นำไปก่อน,  นึ่ง,  ทอด,  ย่างได้ตามต้องการและยัง; สามารถคงสภาพที่สดไว้ได้ถึงสิบสอง (12) เดือนหรือนานกว่านั้นโดยไม่ต้องใช้สารกันเสียที่เป็นเคมี; -------------------------------------------------------- แก้ไขบทสรุปการประดิษฐ์ 5/02/2559 การประดิษฐ์นี้เกี่ยวกับกระบวนการในการจัดเตรียมส่วนประกอบและแผ่นฟิล์มที่มีเนื้อมะพร้าว; สดเป็นหลักซึ่งรวมถึงส่วนที่เป็น การปรับปรุงและการดัดแปลงของมันซึ่งประกอบรวมด้วยเนื้อมะพร้าว; เป็นหลัก โดยที่ผลไม้และผักอื่นๆ จะถูกเติมเข้าไปในรูปเครื่องปรุงรสและสารปรุงแต่ง ส่วนประกอบและ; แผ่นฟิล์มที่มีเนื้อมะพร้าวเป็นหลักเหล่านี้สามารถใช้ในรูป เครป,  แผ่นม้วน และ/หรือห่อหุ้มซึ่งมักจะ; ถูกใช้ในการห่อหุ้มอาหารชนิดใดๆ เช่น ผลไม้ที่สดใหม่,  ผัก,  สลัด หรือเนื้อสัตว์/ปลาที่ปรุงสุกและการ; ผสมผสานใดๆ ของมัน เป็นต้น ซึ่งหลังจากนี้จะถูกม้วน,  พับและรับประทานทันทีในระหว่างมื้ออาหาร; หรือทานเป็นของว่าง ส่วนประกอบและแผ่นฟิล์มซึ่งโดยส่วนใหญ่แล้วประกอบด้วยเนื้อมะพร้าวอ่อนที่; สดจะมีสารอาหารที่มีคุณค่าสูง,  ไม่มีกลูเตน,  ไม่มีคอเลสเตอรอล,  ไม่ผ่านกรรมวิธี,  ไม่ใช้ผลิตภัณฑ์จาก; สัตว์,  มีคาโบไฮเดรตต่ำ,  ไม่เติมเกลือและมีคุณประโยชน์สำหรับสุขภาพของมนุษย์ นอกจากนี้ ส่วน; ประกอบและแผ่นฟิล์มยังสามารถรับประทานได้ทันที,  นำไปก่อน,  นึ่ง,  ทอด,  ย่างได้ตามต้องการและยัง; สามารถคงสภาพที่สดไว้ได้ถึงสิบสอง (12) เดือนหรือนานกว่านั้นโดยไม่ต้องใช้สารกันเสียที่เป็นเคมี; ---------------------------------------------------------------- สิ่งประดิษฐ์นี้เกี่ยวข้องกับกระบวนการเตรียมฟิล์มและสารประกอบที่ได้จากเนื้อมะพร้าวสด รวมถึงการปรับปรุง และ; เปลี่ยนแปลง ซึ่งประกอบหลักด้วย เนื้อมะพร้าวซึ่งผักและผลไม้อื่นได้ถูกเพิ่มลงไปเป็นสารต่างกลิ่งและรส ฟิล์มและ; สารประกอบที่ได้จากเนื้อมะพร้าวเหล่านี้ สามารถใช้เป็นเครป ใช้ในการม้วน หรือ พัน ซึ่งเป็นการใช้ในลักษณะทั่วไปใน; การพันอาหารเช่น ผลไม้สด ผัก สลัด หรือ เนื้อหรือปลาปรุงแล้ว และส่วนผสมของอาหารดังกล่าว เพื่อพัน ม้วน และ; รับประทานในมื้ออาหาร หรือ เป็นอาหารว่าง ฟิล์มและสารประกอบที่ได้จากเนื้อมะพร้าวสดมีสารอาหารในปริมาณสูง ไม่; มีกลูเตน ไม่มีคอเลสโตรรอล เป็นธรรมชาติ มีคาร์โบไฮเดรตต่ำ ไม่ต้องเพิ่มเกลือ และมีประโยชน์ต่อสุขภาพมนุษย์; นอกจากนี้ฟิล์มและสารประกอบที่ได้จากเนื้อมะพร้าวสด สามารถรับประทานได้โดยตรง อบ นึ่ง ทอด ย่าง และยังคงสด; ใหม่เป็นเวลา 12 เดือน หรือนานกว่านั้นโดยไม่ต้องใช้สารเคมีเพื่อถนอมสภาพ

abs_English: The invention relates to a hygiene management method for a food processing facility or a cooking utensil.|A procedure for using a food processing facility or cooking utensil.
abs_Chinese: 食品加工设施或烹饪用具的卫生管理方法。|食品加工设施或烹饪用具的使用程序。
abs_Original: วิธีการจัดการสุขอนามัยของเครื่องอำนวยความสะดวกในการดำเนินกรรมวิธีเกี่ยวกับ อาหารหรือเครื่องใช้ในการประกอบอาหาร|ขั้นตอนการใช้เครื่องอำนวยความสะดวกในการดำเนินกรรมวิธีเกี่ยวกับอาหารหรือเครื่องใช้ในการประกอบอาหาร

abs_English: Feed shell technology and shell feed|The invention relates to a coated food comprising palmitase and binder and a coating process of the food.
abs_Chinese: 食品和食品包壳工艺|本发明涉及一种包括棕榈酶和结合剂的包被食品以及这种食品的包被工艺。
abs_Original: QUY TRÌNH BỌC VỎ THỨC ĂN VÀ THỨC ĂN ĐƯỢC BỌC VỎ|Sáng chế đề cập đến thức ăn được bọc vỏ bao gồm palatinoza và tác nhân gắn kết và quy trình bọc vỏ thức ăn này.

abs_English: Production Process of Molasses Syrup and Molasses Syrup Obtained by the Process|The invention relates to a molasses syrup,  which comprises a liquid of bioactive substances from molasses plants with a content of 2000g/L,  a liquid of fresh lemons and forest honey. This product is a functional food,  which has the functions of purifying the body and supplementing the liver of users. The invention also relates to a production process of bile syrup having the above components.
abs_Chinese: 蜂蜜糖浆的生产工艺及由此工艺得到的蜂蜜糖浆|本发明涉及一种糖蜜糖浆，它包括来自2000g/升含量的糖蜜植物的生物活性物质的液体，新鲜柠檬和森林蜂蜜的液体。 本品是一种功能食品，具有净化身体，补充使用者肝脏的作用。本发明还涉及具有上述成分的胆汁糖浆的生产工艺。
abs_Original: QUY TRÌNH SẢN XUẤT SIRO MÁC MẬT VÀ SIRO MÁC MẬT THU ĐƯỢC TỪ QUY TRÌNH NÀY|Sáng chế đề cập đến siro mác mật bao gồm dịch hoạt chất sinh học từ cây mác mật có hàm lượng 2000g/lít,  dịch quả chanh tươi và mật ong rừng. Sản phẩm này là thực phẩm chức năng có tác dụng thanh lọc cơ thể,  bổ gan cho người dùng.Sáng chế cũng đề cập đến quy trình sản xuất siro mác mật có thành phần như trên.

abs_English: A method for prepare a fermented food composition and a fermented food composition obtain by that method|The invention relates to a method for making a fermented food composition comprising fermented beans and optionally acid salt root vegetables. Other embodiments of the present invention are fermented food compositions obtained by the method and dishes made using the fermented food compositions of the present invention.
abs_Chinese: 发酵食品制剂的生产方法及由此方法得到的发酵食品制剂|本发明涉及一种用于制造发酵食品组合物的方法，该组合物包括发酵豆类，并可选地包括酸盐根菜。 本发明的其它实施例是用该方法得到的发酵食品组合物和使用本发明的发酵食品组合物制作的菜肴。
abs_Original: PHƯƠNG PHÁP TẠO RA CHẾ PHẨM THỰC PHẨM LÊN MEN VÀ CHẾ PHẨM THỰC PHẨM LÊN MEN THU ĐƯỢC TỪ PHƯƠNG PHÁP NÀY|Sáng chế đề cập đến phương pháp tạo ra chế phẩm thực phẩm lên men bao gồm đậu lên men và tùy chọn có thể bao gồm rau củ muối chua. Các phương án khác của sáng chế là chế phẩm thực phẩm lên men thu được bằng phương pháp này và món ăn được chế biến có sử dụng chế phẩm thực phẩm lên men theo sáng chế.

abs_English: Flavor preparation,  food,  beverage,  condiment,  and method for produce that same|A flavor composition,  Used for mixing in food or beverages or condiments,  The composition comprises at least one compound selected from (a) 2-methyl-3-methyluranium thioate and benzaldehyde dimethylacetal,  or at least two compounds selected from 2-methyl-2-pentene,  dimethyl trisulfide,  2-pentylfuran,  dipropyldisulfide and 3-penten-2-ON,  is widely used and easy to produce,  and can produce green onion processing essence. In addition,  the invention also relates to food,  beverage,  spice and production method thereof.
abs_Chinese: 风味组合物，食品，饮料，调味品及其制造方法|本发明涉及一种风味组合物，用于在食品或饮料或调味品中进行混合，使得进餐时的浓度在1ppb至20, 000 ppb之间， 所述组合物含有至少一种选自(a)2-甲基-3-甲基硫代铀和苯甲醛二甲缩醛的化合物，或至少两种选自2-甲基-2-戊烯，二甲基三硫醚，2-戊基呋喃，二丙基二硫醚和3-戊烯-2-ON的化合物，用途广泛，易于生产，可生产青葱加工香精。此外，本发明还涉及食品，饮料，香料及其生产方法。
abs_Original: CHẾ PHẨM TẠO HƯƠNG VỊ,  THỰC PHẨM,  ĐỒ UỐNG,  GIA VỊ VÀ PHƯƠNG PHÁP SẢN XUẤT CHÚNG|Sáng chế đề cập đến chế phẩm tạo hương vị dùng để trộn trong thực phẩm hoặc đồ uống hoặc gia vị sao cho nồng độ lúc ăn là từ 1ppb đến 20.000ppb,  chế phẩm này chứa ít nhất một hợp chất được chọn từ (A) 2-metyl-3-metylthiofuran và benzaldehyt dimetyl axetal,  hoặc ít nhất hai hợp chất được chọn từ nhóm bao gồm 2-metyl-2-pentenal,  dimetyl trisulfua,  2-pentylfuran,  dipropyl disulfua,  và 3-penten-2-on,  được sử dụng một cách rộng rãi và dễ dàng được sản xuất,  và có thể tạo ra hương vị chế biến hẹ tây.Ngoài ra,  sáng chế còn đề cập đến thực phẩm,  đồ uống,  gia vị và các phương pháp sản xuất chúng.

abs_English: Food and process for the manufacture of food products,  including background impregnated with a stabilized composition|The invention provides a food and a food production method,  which comprises the step of partially or completely impregnating a substrate with a stabilizer composition,  wherein the substrate comprises meat,  poultry,  fish,  vegetables,  fruits or dairy products;  Wherein the stabilizer composition comprises :  5% to 30% by weight of one or more gelatinous materials selected from the group consisting of Karagan gelatinous materials,  and optionally comprises :  three-prickly grape gelatinous materials;  An possessed guard;  Xanthan glycine,  gelatinine glycine,  arabinine glycine and AGA powder,  calculated by dry matter weight;  2. 0% to 50% of the salt weight is selected from sodium chloride,  potassium chloride and their mixtures,  calculated according to the dry matter weight;  2. 20% to 60% of that weight of the polysaccharide single component or multi-component is selecte maltoester;  Polido Cortrosa;  Starch and mixtures thereof,  calculated by dry matter weight;  Calculated by weight of phosphating component;  Calculated by dry matter weight;  0% ~ 40% of the weight of any other edible component calculated by dry matter weight;  And. Wherein the total content is equal to 100% by weight.
abs_Chinese: 用稳定剂组合物生产食品和包括浸渍底物的食品的方法|本发明提供了一种食品和食品生产方法，包括用稳定剂组合物部分或全部浸渍底物的步骤，其中底物包括肉，家禽，鱼，蔬菜，水果或乳制品；其中稳定剂组合物包括 : 5%~30%重量的一个或多个胶状物选自卡拉根胶状物，并任意地包括 : 三刺葡萄胶状物； 附身护卫队； 黄原甘氨酸，结冷甘氨酸，阿拉伯甘氨酸和AGA粉，按干物质重量计算；2.盐重量的0%~50%选氯化钠，氯化钾及其混合物，按干物质重量计算；2.多聚糖单组分或多组分重量的20%~60%选麦芽外酯； 波利多-克特罗萨； 淀粉及其混合物，按干物质重量计算；按磷化成分重量计算；按干物质重量计算； 以干物质重量计算的其它任意可食成分重量的0%~40%；以及。其中总含量等于重量的100%。
abs_Original: PHƯƠNG PHÁP SẢN XUẤT THỰC PHẨM VÀ THỰC PHẨM BAO GỒM NỀN ĐÃ ĐƯỢC TẨM BẰNG CHẾ PHẨM LÀM ỔN ĐỊNH|Sáng chế đề xuất thực phẩm và phương pháp sản xuất thực phẩm bao gồm bước tẩm một phần hoặc toàn bộ nền bằng chế phẩm làm ổn định,  trong đó nền bao gồm các miếng thịt,  gia cầm,  cá,  rau,  quả hoặc thực phẩm từ sữa; trong đó chế phẩm làm ổn định bao gồm : 5% đến 30% trọng lượng một hoặc nhiều gôm được chọn từ các gôm caragenan và tùy ý trong số :  gôm cây bồ kết ba gai;  gôm guar;  gôm xanthan,  gôm gellan,  gôm arabic và bột aga,  tính theo trọng lượng của chất khô; 0% đến 50% trọng lượng muối được chọn từ natri clorua,  kali clorua và hỗn hợp của chúng,  tính theo trọng lượng của chất khô; 20% đến 60% trọng lượng một hoặc nhiều thành phần polyglucoza được chọn từ maltođextrin;  polyđextroza;  tinh bột và hỗn hợp của chúng,  tính theo trọng lượng của chất khô; 0% đến 7, 4% trọng lượng thành phần phosphat,  tính theo trọng lượng của chất khô;  và0% đến 40% trọng lượng các thành phần ăn được tùy ý khác tính theo trọng lượng của chất khô; trong đó tổng hàm lượng bằng 100% trọng lượng.

abs_English: A culture medium of a heat-resistant yeast strain for producing trehalose,  and a trehalose fermentation process of the heat-resistant yeast strain cultured with the culture medium.|The invention relates to a culture medium for culturing a heat-resistant yeast strain for producing trehalose and a fermentation process for producing trehalose by using the heat-resistant yeast strain cultured by the culture medium. By design and control,  the company has developed a formulation and process for producing trehalose from thermostable yeast strains to obtain trehalose in high yields,  but at lower production costs than previous other methods. The kind and proportion of raw material as yeast feed source;  Controlling the kind of heat-resisting yeast strain;  Various conditions in the yeast fermentation process are controlled,  so that the yeast fermentation process is suitable for industrial scale production. The trehalose produced based on the heat-resistant yeast fermentation process can be used in industries such as food,  cosmetics,  medicines and the like. The invention relates to a culture medium for culturing a heat-resistant yeast strain for producing trehalose and a fermentation process for producing trehalose by using the heat-resistant yeast strain cultured by the culture medium. By design and control,  the company has developed a formulation and process for producing trehalose from thermostable yeast strains to obtain trehalose in high yields,  but at lower production costs than previous other methods. The kind and proportion of raw material as yeast feed source;  Controlling the kind of heat-resisting yeast strain;  Various conditions in the yeast fermentation process are controlled,  so that the yeast fermentation process is suitable for industrial scale production. The trehalose produced by fermenting the heat-resistant yeast can be used in industries such as food,  cosmetics,  medicines and the like. The invention relates to a culture medium for culturing a heat-resistant yeast strain for producing trehalose and a process for producing trehalose by using the heat-resistant yeast strain cultured by using the culture medium through a fermentation process. Through design and control,  a formula and process for producing trehalose from high-temperature resistant yeast strains is developed to obtain trehalose with high yield,  but the production cost is lower than that of other previous methods. The kind and proportion of raw material as yeast feed source;  Controlling the kind of heat-resisting yeast strain;  The conditions in the yeast fermentation process are controlled,  so that the yeast fermentation process is suitable for industrial scale production. The trehalose produced by the heat-resistant yeast fermentation process can be used in industries such as food,  cosmetics,  medicines and the like.
abs_Chinese: 生产海藻糖的耐热酵母菌株的培养基，以及用该培养基培养的耐热酵母菌株的海藻糖发酵工艺。|本发明涉及一种用于培养产生海藻糖的耐热酵母菌株的培养基，以及利用该培养基培养的耐热酵母菌株的发酵工艺生产海藻糖。通过设计和控制，该公司开发了一种从耐热酵母菌株中生产海藻糖的配方和工艺，以获得高产量的海藻糖，但生产成本低于以前的其他方法。作为酵母饲料来源的原料的种类和比例；控制所使用的耐热酵母菌株的种类；控制酵母发酵过程中的各种条件，使其适合工业规模生产。基于本发明的耐热酵母发酵工艺生产的海藻糖可用于食品、化妆品、医药等行业。(前)编辑07/04/2017本发明涉及一种用于培养产生海藻糖的耐热酵母菌株的培养基，以及利用该培养基培养的耐热酵母菌株的发酵工艺生产海藻糖。通过设计和控制，该公司开发了一种从耐热酵母菌株中生产海藻糖的配方和工艺，以获得高产量的海藻糖，但生产成本低于以前的其他方法。作为酵母饲料来源的原料的种类和比例；控制所使用的耐热酵母菌株的种类；控制酵母发酵过程中的各种条件，使其适合工业规模生产。基于本发明的耐热酵母发酵生产的海藻糖可用于食品、化妆品和医药等行业。--新请求更新日期：26/02/2016本发明涉及一种用于培养产生海藻糖的耐热酵母菌株的培养基，以及利用该培养基培养的耐热酵母菌株通过发酵工艺生产海藻糖的工艺。通过设计和控制，开发了一种从耐高温酵母菌株中生产海藻糖的配方和工艺，以获得高产量的海藻糖，但生产成本低于以前的其他方法。作为酵母饲料来源的原料的种类和比例；控制所使用的耐热酵母菌株的种类；控制酵母发酵过程中的条件，使其适合工业规模生产。根据本发明的耐热酵母发酵工艺生产的海藻糖可用于食品、化妆品和医药等行业。
abs_Original: สูตรอาหารสำหรับเลี้ยงยีสต์สายพันธุ์ทนร้อนที่ผลิตทรีฮาโลส และกระบวนการผลิต ทรีฮาโลสด้วยกระบวนการหมักโดยใช้ยีสต์สายพันธุ์ทนร้อนที่เลี้ยงด้วยสูตรอาหาร ดังกล่าว|แก้ไขใหม่ 15 ก.ย. 2560          การประดิษฐ์นี้เกี่ยวข้องกับสูตรอาหารสำหรับเลี้ยงยีสต์สายพันธุ์ทนร้อนที่ผลิตทรีฮาโลส และ กระบวนการผลิตทรีฮาโลสด้วยกระบวนการหมักโดยใช้ยีสต์สายพันธุ์ทนร้อนที่เลี้ยงด้วยสูตรอาหาร ดังกล่าว โดยได้พัฒนาสูตรอาหารและพัฒนากระบวนการผลิตทรีฮาโลสจากยีสต์สายพันธุ์ทนร้อน ที่ ทำให้ได้ผลผลิตทรีฮาโลสในปริมาณที่สูง แต่มีต้นทุนการผลิตต่ำกว่าวิธีอื่นๆ ที่ปรากฏอยู่ก่อนหน้า โดย ทำการออกแบบและควบคุม ชนิดและสัดส่วนของวัตถุดิบที่ใช้เป็นแหล่งอาหารสำหรับยีสต์ ควบคุมชนิด ของสายพันธุ์ยีสต์ทนร้อนที่นำมาใช้ ควบคุมสภาวะต่างๆ ในขั้นตอนการหมักยีสต์ เพื่อให้มีความ เหมาะสมต่อการผลิตในระดับอุตสาหกรรม ทรีฮาโลสที่ผลิตได้จากกระบวนการหมักยีสต์ทนร้อนตาม การประดิษฐ์นี้ สามารถนำไปใช้ในอุตสาหกรรมต่างๆ อาทิ อาหาร เครื่องสำอาง และยา--------------------------------------------------------------(เดิม)แก้ไข 07/04/2560           การประดิษฐ์นี้เกี่ยวข้องกับสูตรอาหารสำหรับเลี้ยงยีสต์สายพันธุ์ทนร้อนที่ผลิตทรีฮาโลส และ กระบวนการผลิตทรีฮาโลสด้วยกระบวนการหมักโดยใช้ยีสต์สายพันธุ์ทนร้อนที่เลี้ยงด้วยสูตรอาหาร ดังกล่าว โดยได้พัฒนาสูตรอาหารและพัฒนากระบวนการผลิตทรีฮาโลสจากยีสต์สายพันธุ์ทนร้อน ที่ ทำให้ได้ผลผลิตทรีฮาโลสในปริมาณที่สูง แต่มีต้นทุนการผลิตต่ำกว่าวิธีอื่นๆ ที่ปรากฏอยู่ก่อนหน้า โดย ทำการออกแบบและควบคุม ชนิดและสัดส่วนของวัตถุดิบที่ใช้เป็นแหล่งอาหารสำหรับยีสต์ ควบคุมชนิด ของสายพันธุ์ยีสต์ทนร้อนที่นำมาใช้ ควบคุมสภาวะต่างๆ ในขั้นตอนการหมักยีสต์ เพื่อให้มีความ เหมาะสมต่อการผลิตในระดับอุตสาหกรรม ทรีฮาโลสที่ผลิตได้จากกระบวนการหมักยีสต์ทนร้อนตาม การประดิษฐ์นี้ สามารถนำไปใช้ในอุตสาหกรรมต่างๆ อาทิ อาหาร เครื่องสำอาง และยา--------------------------คำขอใหม่ปรับปรุง วันที่ 26/02/2559          การประดิษฐ์นี้เกี่ยวข้องกับสูตรอาหารสำหรับเลี้ยงยีสต์สายพันธุ์ทนร้อนที่ผลิตทรีฮาโลส และกระบวนการผลิตทรีฮาโลสด้วยกระบวนการหมักโดยใช้ยีสต์สายพันธุ์ทนร้อนที่เลี้ยงด้วยสูตรอาหารดังกล่าว  โดยพัฒนาสูตรอาหารและพัฒนากระบวนการผลิตทรีฮาโลสจากยีสต์สายพันธุ์ทนร้อน ที่ทำให้ได้ผลผลิตทรีฮาโลสในปริมาณที่สูง แต่มีต้นทุนการผลิตต่ำกว่าวิธีอื่นๆ ที่ปรากฏอยู่ก่อนหน้า โดยทำการออกแบบและควบคุม ชนิดและสัดส่วนของวัตถุดิบที่ใช้เป็นแหล่งอาหารสำหรับยีสต์ ควบคุมชนิดของสายพันธุ์ยีสต์ทนร้อนที่นำมาใช้ ควบคุมสภาวะต่างๆ ในขั้นตอนการหมักยีสต์ เพื่อให้มีความเหมาะสมต่อการผลิตในระดับอุตสาหกรรม ทรีฮาโลสที่ผลิตได้จากกระบวนการหมักยีสต์ทนร้อนตามการประดิษฐ์นี้ สามารถนำไปใช้ในอุตสาหกรรมต่างๆ อาทิ อาหาร เครื่องสำอาง และยา

abs_English: Double-textured food,  beverage containing such food,  method for producing double-textured food and beverage produced by such method|The invention relates to a food with double texture and a preparation method thereof. The food has double texture and is stably stored in a pre-prepared beverage,  resulting in berry and palatable firmness when chewing. The method may include the steps of compounding the outer layer containing high "G" type alginate with high "M" type alginate or pectin,  and compounding the inner layer containing fruit juice smoothies with pectin and insoluble calcium salt to simulate the sensory characteristics of newly prepared bubble tea pearl particles. The invention also relates to a beverage containing the above food and a beverage produced by the above method.
abs_Chinese: 双重质地食品，含有这种食品的饮料，生产双重质地食品的方法和用这种方法生产的饮料|本发明涉及一种具有双重质地的食品及其制作方法，该食品具有双重质地并在预配制饮料中保存稳定，咀嚼时产生浆果和适口的紧致感。 该方法可包括外层含高“G”型海藻酸盐与高“M”型海藻酸盐或果胶复合，内层含果汁冰沙与果胶和不溶性钙盐复合的步骤，以模拟新配制的珍珠奶茶的珍珠粒感官特性。 本发明还涉及含有上述食品的饮料和用上述方法生产的饮料。
abs_Original: THỰC PHẨM CÓ KẾT CẤU KÉP,  ĐỒ UỐNG CHỨA THỰC PHẨM NÀY,  PHƯƠNG PHÁP SẢN XUẤT THỰC PHẨM CÓ KẾT CẤU KÉP VÀ ĐỒ UỐNG ĐƯỢC SẢN XUẤT BẰNG PHƯƠNG PHÁP NÀY|Sáng chế đề cập đến thực phẩm kết có cấu kép và phương pháp sản xuất thực phẩm có kết cấu kép và ổn định bảo quản trong đồ uống pha chế sẵn,  và tạo ra cảm giác căng mọng và ngon miệng khi nhai. Phương pháp này có thể bao gồm bước kết hợp lớp ngoài chứa alginat "G" cao với alginat "M" cao hoặc pectin,  và lớp trong bao gồm sinh tố nước ép trái cây với gôm và muối canxi không tan để mô phỏng các đặc tính cảm quan của hạt trân châu của trà sữa trân châu mới pha chế. Sáng chế cũng đề cập đến đồ uống chứa thực phẩm nêu trên và đồ uống được sản xuất bằng phương pháp nêu trên.

abs_English: Caraway powder|The seasoning powder is a food seasoning powder and is used as a curry seasoning. The ingredients include vegetable powder 70 wt%,  lemon grass powder 10 wt% and galangal powder 10 wt%. Weight :  bergamot leaf 10% (by weight),  its preparation method comprises adding vegetable powder,  lemongrass,  galangal and leaf;  Washing Fructus Citri Sarcodactylis with clear water,  insolating in sunlight,  baking,  mashing,  and mixing with wild vegetable powder;  Grinding Herba Citri Limoniae,  Rhizoma Alpiniae Officinarum,  and Folium Citri Sarcodactylis;  mixing;  Together
abs_Chinese: 香菜粉|调味粉是一种食品调味粉，用作咖喱调味料。配料包括：蔬菜粉占重量的70%，柠檬草粉占重量的10%，高良姜粉占重量的10%；重量：佛手柑叶10%(按重量计)，其制作方法是将蔬菜粉、柠檬草、高良姜和叶加入其中；佛手，用清水洗净，然后放在阳光下暴晒，然后烘烤，再捣碎，再用野菜粉；将磨碎的柠檬草、磨碎的高良姜、磨碎的佛手柑叶一起磨碎混合；一起
abs_Original: ผงแขยงแต่งกลิ่น|ผงแขยงแต่งกลิ่น ที่ประดิษฐ์ขึ้นเป็นผงเเต่งกลิ่นอาหารที่ใช้เป็นเครื่องปรุงประเภทแกง โดยมี; ส่วนผสม ประกอบด้วย ผักแขยงผง 70 % โดยน้ำหนัก ตะไคร้ผง 10 % โดยน้ำหนัก ข่าผง 10 % โดย; น้ำหนัก ใบมะกรูด 10 % โดยน้ำหนัก โดยผ่านกรรมวิธีการผลิต คือนำผักแขยงผง ตะไคร้ ข่า และใบ; มะกรูด ล้างน้ำให้สะอาด แล้วนำไปตากแดด จากนั้นนำไปอบ แล้วบดให้ละเอียด จากนั้นนำ ผักแขยงผง; บดละเอียด ตะไคร้บดละเอียด ข่าบดบดละเอียด และใบมะกรูดบดละเอียด มาบดให้ละเอียดและผสม; กัน

abs_English: A composition in the form of crushed granules is composed of cellulose microfilaments.|The purpose of the present invention is to prepare a disintegrating tablet with good tablet hardness and good disintegrating property,  which is suitable for various medicines and foods such as dietary supplement,  nutritional and health foods,  requiring a very convenient form,  to be eaten safely by patients,  the elderly,  and children with dysphagia,  and to be eaten anywhere without effort in the absence of water;  And a disintegrating granular composition contained in the disintegrating tablet. The present invention relates to a disintegrating granular composition formed by combining a disintegrating granular composition and cellulose microfilaments,  and a disintegrating tablet for a drug or a food,  which is formed by combining a composition in the form of disintegrating granules having excellent tablet hardness and disintegrating ability.
abs_Chinese: 一种由纤维素微纤丝组成的助碎颗粒状的组合物。|本发明的目的是制备一种适用于膳食补充剂等各类药品和食品的具有良好片剂硬度和良好崩解性的崩解片，营养食品和健康食品，需要非常方便的形式，使吞咽困难的病人，老人，儿童，安全地食用，以及无论在什么地方，都可以毫不费力地在没有水的情况下食用；以及包含在崩解片中的崩解颗粒状组合物。本发明涉及由崩解颗粒状组合物和纤维素微纤丝组合而成的崩解颗粒状组合物，以及一种用于药品或食品的崩解片，其由具有优异的片剂硬度和崩解能力的崩解颗粒形式的组合物组合而成。
abs_Original: องค์ประกอบในรูปอนุภาคที่ช่วยแตกตัวซึ่งประกอบด้วยไมโครไฟบริลเลเทดเซลลูโลส|วัตถุประสงค์ของการประดิษฐ์นี้เพื่อจัดเตรียมยาเม็ดชนิดแตกตัวที่มีความแข็งเม็ดยา และความสามารถแตกตัวได้ดีเยี่ยม ซึ่งเหมาะสมสำหรับเภสัชภัณฑ์และอาหารประเภทต่างๆ เช่นผลิตภัณฑ์เสริมอาหาร,  อาหารฟังค์ชันเชิงโภชนาการและอาหารสุขภาพซึ่งต้องการให้อยู่ในรูปที่ใช้สะดวกเป็นอย่างมากซึ่งผู้ป่วยที่กลืนยายาก,  ผู้สูงอายุ,  เด็ก,  ๆลๆ สามารถกินได้อย่างปลอดภัย,  และซึ่งสามารถกินได้อย่างง่ายดายโดยไม่ต้องมีน้ำโดยไม่คำนึงถึงสถานที่;  และองค์ประกอบในรุปอนุภาคที่ช่วยแตกตัวที่มีอยู่ในยาเม็ดชนิดแตกตัว การประดิษฐ์นี้เกี่ยวข้องกับองค์ประกอบในรูปอนุภาคที่ช่วยแตกตัวซึ่งประกอบรวมด้วยส่วนประกอบสารช่วยแตกตัวและไมโครไฟบริลเลเทดเซลลูโลส,  และยาเม็ดชนิดแตกตัวสำหรับเภสัชภัณฑ์หรืออาหารซึ่งประกอบรวมด้วยองค์ประกอบในรูปอนุภาคที่ช่วยแตกตัวซึ่งมีความแข็งเม็ดยาและความสามารถแตกตัวได้ดีเลิศ

abs_English: Methods for producing liquid food,  powdered food and skimmed milk powder|The invention relates to a production method of liquid food,  which is suitable for fully and effectively reducing the dissolved oxygen concentration in liquid food with high foaming property and low defoaming property such as skim milk. By putting the liquid food into a decompression container (a decompression container,  a vacuum container,  a vacuum container,  etc.),  Reducing the dissolved oxygen concentration of the liquid food,  heating the liquid food to a temperature greater than or equal to the saturation temperature (boiling point) of the liquid food under reduced pressure gas environment conditions in a reduced pressure container,  Or put the liquid food into the decompression container,  and reduce the pressure of the decompression container to a pressure lower than or equal to the saturated vapor pressure (saturation pressure) of the liquid food at the temperature of the liquid food.
abs_Chinese: 液体食品，粉状食品和脱脂奶粉的生产方法|本发明涉及一种液态食品的生产方法，适用于充分有效地降低脱脂乳等具有高发泡性和低消泡性的液态食品中的溶解氧浓度。 通过将液体食品放入减压容器(减压容器，真空容器，真空容器等)，降低液体食品的溶解氧浓度 在减压容器内将液体食品加热到大于或等于减压气体环境条件下液体食品的饱和温度(沸点)的温度，或将液体食品放入减压容器，同时将减压容器压力降低到低于或等于液体食品在液体食品温度下的饱和蒸汽压(饱和压力)的压力。
abs_Original: PHƯƠNG PHÁP SẢN XUẤT THỰC PHẨM LỎNG,  THỰC PHẨM BỘT VÀ SỮA BỘT GẦY|Sáng chế đề cập đến phương pháp sản xuất thực phẩm lỏng,  thích hợp để làm giảm một cách đầy đủ và hữu hiệu nồng độ oxy hoà tan trong thực phẩm lỏng có đặc tính tạo bọt cao và đặc tính khử bọt thấp như sữa gầy. Nồng độ oxy hoà tan của thực phẩm lỏng được làm giảm bằng cách đặt thực phẩm lỏng vào bình giảm áp (thùng giảm áp,  bình chân không,  thùng chân không,  v.v.) trong khi gia nhiệt thực phẩm lỏng tới nhiệt độ lớn hơn hoặc bằng nhiệt độ bão hoà (điểm sôi) của thực phẩm lỏng trong điều kiện môi trường khí giảm áp trong bình giảm áp hoặc đặt thực phẩm lỏng vào bình giảm áp trong khi làm giảm áp bình giảm áp tới áp suất thấp hơn hoặc bằng áp suất hơi bão hoà (áp suất bão hoà) của thực phẩm lỏng ở nhiệt độ của thực phẩm lỏng.

abs_English: Sweetener composition and food containing such sweetener composition|The invention relates to a sweetener composition useful for food as a substitute sweetener for sugar. Specifically,  the sweetening preparation contains sweetener O and sweetener N as active ingredients,  or at least one sweetener D and M and at least one sweetener O and sweetener N as active ingredients. In addition,  this sweetener composition is also used in combination with additional sweeteners.
abs_Chinese: 一种甜味制剂和含有这种甜味制剂的食品|本发明涉及一种可用于食品的甜味剂组合物，作为糖的替代甜味剂。 具体地说，这种甜味制剂含有甜叶闪石O和甜叶闪石N作为有效成分，或含有至少一种甜叶闪石D和甜叶闪石M以及至少一种甜叶闪石O和甜叶闪石N作为有效成分。 此外，这种甜味剂组合物还与附加甜味剂配合使用。
abs_Original: CHẾ PHẨM TẠO NGỌT VÀ THỰC PHẨM CHỨA CHẾ PHẨM TẠO NGỌT NÀY|Sáng chế đề cập đến chế phẩm tạo ngọt mà có thể sử dụng được cho thực phẩm làm chất tạo ngọt thay thế đường. Cụ thể,  chế phẩm tạo ngọt này chứa rebaudiosit O và rebaudiosit N làm thành phần hoạt tính,  hoặc chứa ít nhất một trong số rebaudiosit D và rebaudiosit M và ít nhất một trong số rebaudiosit O và rebaudiosit N làm thành phần hoạt tính. Ngoài ra,  chế phẩm tạo ngọt này còn được sử dụng kết hợp với chất tạo ngọt bổ sung.

abs_English: Preparation for promoting hair growth or hair recovery and anti-inflammatory preparation|The invention relates to a composition for promoting hair growth or recovery and an anti-inflammatory composition. The composition comprises a drug,  cosmetic or food product and comprises at least one substance selected from the group consisting of AssamponeB,  Theasaponin E1,  Theasaponin E2,  AssamponeH,  AssamponeD and Theasaponin C1.
abs_Chinese: 促进头发生长或恢复的制剂和抗炎制剂|本发明涉及一种促进头发生长或恢复的组合物和一种抗炎组合物。 该组合物包括药物，化妆品或食品，并且含有至少一种选自AssamponeB，Theasaponin E1，Theasaponin E2，AssamponeH，AssamponeD和Theasaponin C1的物质。
abs_Original: CHẾ PHẨM THÚC ĐẨY SỰ MỌC TÓC HOẶC PHỤC HỒI TÓC VÀ CHẾ PHẨM KHÁNG VIÊM|Sáng chế đề cập đến chế phẩm thúc đẩy sự mọc tóc hoặc phục hồi tóc và chế phẩm kháng viêm. Chế phẩm này bao gồm dược phẩm,  mỹ phẩm hoặc thực phẩm,  và chứa ít nhất một chất được chọn từ nhóm gồm assamsaponin B,  theasaponin E1,  theasaponin E2,  assamsaponin H,  assamsaponin D và theasaponin C1.

abs_English: Compounds,  compositions and methods for increasing food flavor|The present invention relates to compounds and compositions for increasing the flavor and delicate flavor (meat sweetness) of food products. In particular,  the present invention relates to a compound having formula (I) and a composition containing the compound. In addition,  the invention also relates to a method for increasing food flavor and delicate flavor. & lt;  Image1
abs_Chinese: 提高食品鲜味的化合物，组合物和方法|本发明涉及用于增加食品的风味和鲜味(肉类甜味)的化合物和组合物。 具体而言，本发明涉及具有式(I)的化合物和含有该化合物的组合物。 此外，本发明还涉及一种增加食品风味和鲜味的方法。&lt；image1
abs_Original: HỢP CHẤT,  CHẾ PHẨM VÀ PHƯƠNG PHÁP LÀM TĂNG HƯƠNG VỊ UMAMI CỦA THỰC PHẨM|Sáng chế đề cập đến các hợp chất và chế phẩm được sử dụng làm tăng hương vị và vị umami (vị ngọt thịt) của thực phẩm. Cụ thể,  sáng chế đề cập đến hợp chất có công thức (I) và chế phẩm chứa hợp chất này. Ngoài ra,  sáng chế còn đề cập đến phương pháp làm tăng hương vị và vị umami của thực phẩm.< Image1

abs_English: Liquid or pasty or frozen food compositions and containers and methods of making the same.|Liquid or pasty food compositions,  containers having high microbial safety and/or complete solidification even under freezing conditions;  Moreover. It can be quickly and uniformly dispersed in warm water or added with water,  and can make the final food possess toughness by means of heating and making method.
abs_Chinese: 液体或糊状或冷冻状的食品组合物及其容器和制造方法。|液体或糊状的食品组合物，即使在冷冻条件下也具有高度的微生物安全性和/或完全固化的容器；而且。它可以快速均匀地分散在温水或加水中，并通过加热和制造方法使最终的食品具有韧性。
abs_Original: สารองค์ประกอบผลิตภัณฑ์อาหารในรูปของเหลวหรือในรูปเพสต์หรือแช่แข็ง บรรจุภาชนะและวิธีผลิตนั้น|สารองค์ประกอบผลิตภัณฑ์อาหารในรูปของเหลวหรือในรูปเพสต์บรรจุภาชนะที่มีความปลอด ภัยของจุลินทรีย์สูงและ/หรือไม่กลายเป็นของเเข๋งอย่างสมบูรณ์ แม้ในสภาพแช่แข็งก็ตาม และ สามารถกระจายตัวในน้ำอุ่นหรือน้ำที่มีการเติมได้อย่างรวดเร็วและสม่ำเสมอ อีกทั้งทำให้ผลิต ภัณฑ์อาหารสุดท้ายมีความเหนียวโดยทีการปรุงอาหารโดยการให้ความร้อนและวิธีผลิตนั้น

abs_English: A food additive for food production is used for preventing cranial nerve diseases and/or improving brain function.|Revision 23/01/2017 provides a food additive material for promoting the release of intracerebral monoamines such as dopamine and norepinephrine and providing a function of preventing cranial neuropathy;  Moreover. The function of brain function is improved by adding it to a food product. The method comprises using as a dipeptide-containing oligopeptide mixture a dietary supplement;  Or. The tripeptide contains tyrosine or phenylalanine,  is an amino acid,  is a food for preventing cranial nerve diseases or improving brain functions,  provides raw materials for food additives,  promotes release of intracerebral monoamines such as dopamine,  norepinephrine and the like,  and plays a role in preventing cranial nerve diseases. And improving brain function by adding it to a food product,  the method involving using a mixture of oligopeptides containing dipeptides or tripeptides as a food additive. An amino acid containing tyrosine or phenylalanine can be used for producing food for preventing cranial nerve diseases or food for improving brain function.
abs_Chinese: 用于预防脑神经疾病和/或改善脑功能的食品生产的食品添加剂。|修订23/01/2017，提供的是促进多巴胺、去甲肾上腺素等脑内单胺释放并提供预防脑神经疾病功能的食品添加剂原料；而且。通过将其添加到食品中来改善大脑功能的功能。这种方法包括用作含有二肽的寡肽混合物的食品添加剂；或。三肽含有酪氨酸或苯丙氨酸，是一种氨基酸，是一种预防脑神经疾病的食物或改善大脑功能的食物--为食品添加剂提供原料，促进多巴胺、去甲肾上腺素等脑内单胺的释放，起到预防脑神经疾病的作用。并通过将其添加到食品中来改善大脑功能，该方法涉及使用含有二肽或三肽的寡肽混合物作为食品添加剂。含有酪氨酸或苯丙氨酸的氨基酸，用于生产预防脑神经疾病的食品或改善大脑功能的食品。
abs_Original: สารเติมแต่งอาหารสำหรับการผลิตอาหารสำหรับการป้องกันโรคเส้นประสาทสมอง และ/หรือการปรับปรุงการทำงานของสมอง|แก้ไข 23/01/2560 ที่จัดให้มีคือวัตถุดิบสำหรับสารเติมแต่งอาหารที่ส่งเสริมการปล่อยโมโนเอมีนภายในสมอง เช่น โดพามีนและนอร์อะดรีนาลีน และให้การทำงานในการป้องกันโรคเส้นประสาทสมอง และ การทำงานในการปรับปรุงการทำงานของสมองแก่อาหารโดยการเพิ่มไปยังอาหารดังกล่าว วิธีนี้ เกี่ยวข้องกับการใช้ในฐานะเป็นสารเติมแต่งอาหารของผสมโอลิโกเปปไทด์ที่มีไดเปปไทด์หรือ ไตรเปปไทด์ที่มีไทโรซีนหรือฟีนิลอะลานีนเป็นอะมิโนแอซิดที่เป็นส่วนประกอบในการที่จะผลิต อาหารเพื่อป้องกันโรคเส้นประสาทสมองหรืออาหารเพื่อปรับปรุงการทำงานของสมอง------- จัดให้มีวัตถุดิบสำหรับสารเติมแต่งอาหารซึ่งจะส่งเสริมการปลดปล่อยโมโนเอมีนภายในสมอง เช่น โดพามีน และนอร์อะดรีนาลีน,  และจะให้การทำหน้าที่เพื่อป้องกันโรคประสาทสมอง และการทำหน้าที่เพื่อปรับปรุงการทำหน้าที่ของสมองให้ดีขึ้นแก่อาหาร,  โดยจะเติมลงในอาหารดังกล่าววิธีการนี้จะเกี่ยวข้องกับการใช้ของผสมโอลิโกเพพไทด์ที่มีไดเพพไทด์ หรือไตรเพพไทด์เป็นสารเติมแต่งอาหาร โดยที่มีไทโรซีน หรือฟีนิลอะลานีนเป็นกรดอะมิโนที่เป็นส่วนประกอบ เพื่อที่จะผลิตอาหารเพื่อป้องกันโรคประสาทสมอง หรืออาหารเพื่อปรับปรุงการทำหน้าที่ของสมองให้ดีขึ้น

abs_English: Production method of food processed from meat or aquatic products and enzyme preparation for improving the quality of food processed from meat or aquatic products|The invention relates to a method for producing meat or aquatic processed food with improved flavor and straightening property by converting A-1,  4 bonds into A-1,  6 bonds using transglutaminase and enzyme with sugar metabolism activity in the production process of meat or aquatic processed food.
abs_Chinese: 用肉类或水产品生产加工食品的方法和提高肉类或水产品加工食品质量的酶制剂|本发明涉及在肉类或水产加工食品的生产过程中，利用转谷氨酰胺酶和具有糖类代谢活性的酶将A-1，4键转变为A-1，6键来生产风味和理顺性得到改进的肉类或水产加工食品的方法。
abs_Original: PHƯƠNG PHÁP SẢN XUẤT THỰC PHẨM CHẾ BIẾN TỪ THỊT HOẶC THỦY SẢN VÀ CHẾ PHẨM ENZYM ĐỂ CẢI THIỆN CHẤT LƯỢNG THỰC PHẨM CHẾ BIẾN TỪ THỊT HOẶC THỦY SẢN|Sáng chế đề cập tới phương pháp sản xuất thực phẩm chế biến từ thịt hoặc thuỷ sản có vị và lý tính được cải thiện bằng cách sử dụng transglutaminaza và enzym có hoạt tính chuyển hoá sacarit để biến đổi liên kết a-1, 4 thành liên kết a-1, 6 trong quy trình sản xuất thực phẩm chế biến từ thịt hoặc thuỷ sản.

abs_English: Circular rice paper production equipment|The invention relates to a round coated cake production equipment which meets the production technology of round coated cake with reasonable diameter and thickness made from diluted rice flour. The gear diameter can be adjusted by replacing the forming shaft. The thickness of the cake is directly adjusted on the machine by adjusting the powder layer adhered to the molding shaft and the gap between the molding surface and the fabric conveying surface. On the shaping shaft there is a round convex double-sided relief made of food rubber material. The food rubber material is beneficial to the adhesion of rice flour to the circumferential surfaces of the two convex surfaces of the forming shaft,  and is also beneficial to the printing process of stamping the rice flour layer from the forming shaft to the surface of the fabric conveyor belt. The speed of the forming shaft and the fabric conveyor can be adjusted by the frequency converter. The steamed part is optimized to ensure that enough cakes are evenly cooked on the cake surface without heat loss. Part of the steam chamber is heated by resistance or gas. The cake coming out of the cooking room must be cooled by a fan system,  then the cake must be separated from the cloth with a scraper and sprinkled on it. .
abs_Chinese: 圆形包覆饼生产设备|本发明是一种满足由稀释米粉制成直径，厚度合理的圆形包衣饼生产技术的圆形包衣饼生产设备。 通过更换成形轴可调节齿轮直径。 通过调整粘在成型轴上的粉层以及成型面与织物输送面之间的间隙，在该机上直接调整饼的厚度。 在成形轴上有一个由食品橡胶材料制成的圆形凸起的双面浮雕。 食品橡胶材料有利于米粉粘附到成形轴两凸面的圆周面上，也有利于将米粉层从成形轴冲压到织物输送带表面的印刷工艺。 成形轴的速度以及织物输送机都可以通过变频器调节速度。 蒸熟部分经过优化设计，保证足够的蛋糕在蛋糕面上均匀地熟透，并且没有热量损失。 蒸室部分用电阻或气体加热。 从蒸煮室出来的蛋糕必须通过风扇系统冷却，然后用刮刀把蛋糕从布料上分离出来，然后撒在上面。 。
abs_Original: THIẾT BỊ SẢN XUẤT BÁNH TRÁNG DẠNG TRÒN|Sáng chế đề cập đến thiết bị sản xuất bánh tráng dạng tròn đáp ứng được công nghệ sản xuất từ bột gạo pha loãng thành bánh tráng dạng tròn có đường kính và chiều dày hợp lý. Đường kính bánh có thể điều chỉnh bằng cách thay thế trục tạo hình. Chiều dày của bánh được điều chỉnh trực tiếp trên máy nhờ điều chỉnh lớp bột dính lên trục tạo hình và khe hở giữa bề mặt tạo hình và bề mặt băng tải vải. Trên trục tạo hình có đắp nổi hai mặt lồi có dạng hình tròn bằng vật liệu cao su thực phẩm. Vật liệu cao su thực phẩm tạo điều kiện thuận lợi cho sự bám dính của bột gạo lên bề mặt tròn của hai mặt lồi của trục tạo hình cũng như quá trình in dập lớp bột từ trục tạo hình lên bề mặt băng tải vải được dễ đàng. Vận tốc của trục tạo hình cũng như băng tải vải có thể điều chỉnh vận tốc bằng biến tần. Phần hấp chín được thiết kế tối ưu để đảm bảo bánh đủ chín đều trên mặt bánh và không bị tổn thất nhiệt. Phần buồng hấp được gia nhiệt bằng điện trở hoặc gas. Bánh sau khi ra khỏi buồng hấp phải được làm nguội nhờ hệ thống quạt và sau đó được dao gạt tách bánh khỏi băng vải và rải lên phên. .

abs_English: Culture containing microorganisms of the genus Harmonella,  flavoring preparations,  cosmetics,  foods,  beverages and pharmaceuticals containing the culture|The invention relates to a culture product containing a large amount of ethyl benzoate and having more complex and fresher fruit aroma than chemically synthesized products. This culture product is obtained by culturing Wiekerhamomyces microorganisms in a medium containing milk components. The invention also relates to fragrance compositions,  cosmetics,  food products,  beverages and medicines containing such cultured products,  and methods for introducing fragrance into cosmetics,  food products,  beverages and medicines.
abs_Chinese: 含有威克氏酵母属微生物的培养产品；含此培养产品的调味制剂，化妆品，食品，饮料和药品|本发明涉及一种含有大量苯甲酸乙酯，比化学合成产品具有更复杂，更清新的果香的培养产品。 这种培养产品是在含有乳成分的培养基中培养Wiekerhamomyces属的微生物得到的。 本发明还涉及含有这种培养产品的香味组合物，化妆品，食品，饮料和药品，以及将香味引入化妆品，食品，饮料和药品的方法。
abs_Original: SẢN PHẨM NUÔI CẤY CHỨA VI SINH VẬT THUỘC CHI WICKERHAMOMYCES,  CHẾ PHẨM TẠO HƯƠNG,  MỸ PHẨM,  THỰC PHẨM,  ĐỒ UỐNG VÀ DƯỢC PHẨM CHỨA SẢN PHẨM NUÔI CẤY NÀY|Sáng chế đề cập đến sản phẩm nuôi cấy chứa lượng lớn etyl benzoat và có hương trái cây phức hợp hơn và tươi mát hơn so với sản phẩm tổng hợp hóa học. Sản phẩm nuôi cấy này thu được bằng cách nuôi cấy vi sinh vật thuộc chi Wiekerhamomyces trong môi trường nuôi cấy chứa thành phần sữa. Sáng chế cũng đề cập đến chế phẩm tạo hương,  mỹ phẩm,  thực phẩm,  đồ uống và dược phẩm chứa sản phẩm nuôi cấy này cũng như phương pháp đưa hương thơm vào mỹ phẩm,  thực phẩm,  đồ uống và dược phẩm.

abs_English: A food product is prepared from waxy Kazawa starch.|The new request was updated on Feb. 26,  2016 for food ingredients containing dairy ingredients. And contains an Akvius phase in combination with waxy carbazoin-sibitane starch,  which is substituted with an acetyl group,  thereby thickening the Akvius phase like yoghourt. Methods of making such foods are also provided.
abs_Chinese: 加工蜡状卡扎瓦淀粉的食品。|新请求更新于2016年2月26日，含有乳制品成分的食品成分。并含有与蜡质卡扎因-希比泰淀粉结合的Akvius相，其与乙酰基取代，从而使该Akvius相增稠，就像酸奶一样。还提供了制造这种食品的方法。
abs_Original: ผลิตภัณฑ์อาหารซึ่งมีแวกซี่คาซาวาสตาร์ชชนิดแปรรูป|คำขอใหม่ปรับปรุง วันที่ 26/02/2559          องค์ประกอบผลิตภัณฑ์อาหารซึ่งมีส่วนประกอบจากผลิตภัณฑ์นม และซึ่งมีแอคเควียสเฟสที่ประกอบรวมด้วยแวกซี่คาซาอินฮิบิเทดสตาร์ชที่มีการแทนที่ด้วยแอซีทิลในปริมาณที่ยังผลเพื่อทำให้เกิดการข้นขึ้นของแอคเควียสเฟสดังกล่าวดังเช้นโยเกิร์ต ได้ถูกให้ไว้วิธีของการสร้างผลิตภัณฑ์อาหารดังกล่าวยังถูกให้ไว้ด้วย

abs_English: A food container having a plurality of apertures for separating liquids,  particularly fats,  from food.|The utility model relates to a food container with a plurality of small holes,  which is used for separating liquid,  particularly fat,  from food. The utility model is characterized in that the bottom wall of the container (1) is provided with a container (1) with a small hole (2). Any amount,  any amount,  is used to fill a liquid,  particularly fat,  flowing from the top to separate the fat from the food.
abs_Chinese: 有许多小孔的食物容器，用于将液体，特别是脂肪从食物中分离出来。|一种具有多个小孔的食品容器，用于将液体，特别是脂肪从食品中分离出来。其特征是在容器(1)的底部壁上设置一个小孔(2)的容器(1)。任一量，任一量，用于填充液体，尤指从顶部流出的脂肪，以将脂肪从食物中分离出来。
abs_Original: ภาชนะใส่อาหารที่มีหลุมขนาดเล็กจำนวนหนึ่งสำหรับแยกของเหลว โดยเฉพาะไขมันออกจากอาหาร|ภาชนะใส่อาหารที่มีหลุมขนาดเล็กจำนวนหนึ่งสำหรับแยกของเหลวโดยเฉพาะไขมันออกจากอาหาร มีลักษณะเป็นภาชนะ (1) ที่จัดให้บริเวณผนังด้านล่างของภาชนะ (1) ด้านในมีหลุมขนาดเล็ก (2) จำนวนหนึ่งที่ทำหน้าที่บรรจุของเหลวโดยเฉพาะไขมันที่ไหลมาจากด้านบนเพื่อแยกไขมันออกจากตัวอาหาร

abs_English: Pharmaceutical preparations,  antiallergic agents,  foods and cosmetics containing extracts of the genus Justicia|The invention relates to a pharmaceutical composition,  an antiallergic agent,  a food composition and a cosmetic composition,  which comprise an extract of a plant of the genus Justicia or a fragment thereof as an active ingredient. The secretion of the extract of the invention belongs to the plant extract or the secretion of the extract can inhibit the secretion and extravasation of mast cell and basophilic granulocyte IgE antibody,  and shows good antiallergic effect,  thus effectively preventing,  treating or improving the disease condition of allergic diseases. & LT;  IMAGE1
abs_Chinese: 含春分属(Justicia)植物提取物的药物组合物，抗过敏剂，食品和化妆品|本发明涉及一种药物组合物，抗过敏剂，食品组合物和化妆品组合物，其包括春分属(Justicia)植物的提取物或其片段作为有效成分。 本发明提取物的分泌物属植物提取物或提取物的分泌物可抑制肥大细胞和嗜碱性粒细胞IgE抗体的分泌和外渗，表现出良好的抗过敏作用，因而可有效预防，治疗或改善变态反应性疾病的病情。&LT；IMAGE1
abs_Original: CHẾ PHẨM DƯỢC,  TÁC NHÂN CHỐNG DỊ ỨNG,  THỰC PHẨM VÀ MỸ PHẨM CHỨA CHẤT CHIẾT CỦA CÂY THUỘC CHI XUÂN TIẾT (JUSTICIA)|Sáng chế đề cập đến chế phẩm dược,  tác nhân chống dị ứng,  chế phẩm thực phẩm và chế phẩm mỹ phẩm bao gồm chất chiết của cây thuộc chi Xuân tiết (Justicia) hoặc một phân đoạn của nó dưới dạng thành phần hoạt tính. Chất chiết của cây thuộc chi Xuân tiết hoặc phân đoạn chiết của chất chiết theo sáng chế có thể ức chế sự tiết kháng thể IgE và sự thoát bọng của các tế bào mast và tế bào bạch cầu ái kiềm,  và biểu hiện tác dụng chống dị ứng tốt,  do đó có thể phòng,  điều trị hoặc cải thiện tình trạng bệnh dị ứng một cách hiệu quả.< Image1

abs_English: Sugar-containing product and method of making such product|The present invention relates to products containing sugar xylose (e.g. D-xylose or L-xylose and another sweetener,  e.g. Glucose). Examples of products include cosmetic products,  oral care products,  therapeutic products,  nutritional drug products,  diagnostic products,  beverages,  animal food products and human food products. The invention provides a method for producing xylose-containing products using biomass.
abs_Chinese: 含糖产品及生产这种产品的方法|本发明涉及含糖木糖(例如D-木糖或L-木糖和另一种甜味剂，例如葡萄糖)的产品。 举例说明的产品包括化妆品产品，口腔护理产品，治疗产品，营养药物产品，诊断产品，饮料，动物食品产品和人类食品产品。 本发明提供了利用生物质生产含木糖产物的方法。
abs_Original: SẢN PHẨM CHỨA ĐƯỜNG VÀ PHƯƠNG PHÁP TẠO RA SẢN PHẨM NÀY|Sáng chế đề cập đến các sản phẩm chứa đường xyloza (ví dụ,  D-xyloza hoặc L- xyloza và một chất làm ngọt khác như glucoza). Các sản phẩm làm ví dụ bao gồm sản phẩm mỹ phẩm,  sản phẩm chăm sóc răng miệng,  sản phẩm trị liệu,  sản phẩm dược dinh dưỡng,  sản phẩm chẩn đoán,  đồ uống,  sản phẩm thực phẩm dùng cho động vật,  và sản phẩm thực phẩm dùng cho con người. Sáng chế đề xuất các phương pháp tạo ra các sản phẩm chứa xyloza từ sinh khối.

abs_English: Production technology of virgin coconut oil|Useful solutions refer to the production process of primary coconut oil (Virgin Coconut Oil :  VCO). The process under the useful scheme includes the steps of a) collecting clean coconut rice;  b) treating coconut rice;  c) collecting coconut rice liquid;  d) collecting coconut milk;  e) collecting semi-pure coconut oil;  f) collecting raw coconut oil. The process under the useful scheme allows the composition and function of oil in natural coconuts to be obtained,  thus being able to be used in foods,  cosmetics and medicines.
abs_Chinese: 初榨椰子油的生产工艺|有用的解决办法是指初级椰子油(维珍椰子油 : VCO)的生产过程。 有用方案下的工艺包括步骤a)收集干净的椰子饭；b)处理椰子饭；c)收集椰子饭液；d)收集椰子奶；e)收集半纯椰子油；f)收集原始椰子油。有用方案下的工艺允许获得天然椰子中的油的组成比例和功能，从而能够用于食品，化妆品和药品。
abs_Original: QUY TRÌNH SẢN XUẤT DẦU DỪA NGUYÊN SINH|Giải pháp hữu ích đề cập đến quy trình sản xuất dầu dừa nguyên sinh (virgin coconut oil :  VCO). Quy trình theo giải pháp hữu ích bao gồm các bước a) thu cơm dừa sạch;  b) xử lý cơm dừa;  c) thu dịch cơm dừa;  d) thu sữa dừa;  e) thu dầu dừa bán tinh khiết;  và f) thu dầu dừa nguyên sinh. Quy trình theo giải pháp hữu ích cho phép thu được tỷ lệ thành phần và hàm hượng dầu như trong dừa tự nhiên nên có khả năng sử dụng được trong thực phẩm,  mỹ phẩm và dược phẩm.

abs_English: Regulators of adiponectin secretion;  Food products,  beverages,  cosmetics,  medicines and animal feeds containing such regulators|The invention relates to a substance that regulates the secretion of adiponectin,  thereby effectively expressing the effect of adiponectin but avoiding the adverse effect of increasing tartar sensation involved in adiponectin. The invention also relates to food/beverage products,  functional foods,  cosmetics,  drugs and animal feeds with the function of regulating adiponectin secretion. According to the present invention,  fucoidan or its precursor is used as an active ingredient of a factor that regulates adiponectin secretion. Food/beverages,  functional foods,  cosmetics or animal feeds with the function of regulating adiponectin secretion are obtained by mixing with a certain amount of fucoidan or its precursors.
abs_Chinese: 脂联素分泌的调节物质。食品产品，饮料，化妆品，药品和动物饲料中含有这种调节物质|本发明涉及一种调节脂联素分泌的物质，从而有效地表达脂联素的作用但避免了增加脂联素所涉及的牙垢感的不利影响。 本发明还涉及具有调节脂联素分泌作用的食品/饮料产品，功能食品，化妆品，药品和动物饲料。根据本发明，岩藻多糖或其前体被用作调节脂联素分泌的因子的活性成分。 具有调节脂联素分泌作用的食品/饮料，功能食品，化妆品或动物饲料，是通过与一定量的岩藻多糖或其前体混合而获得的。
abs_Original: CHẤT ĐIỀU HÒA SỰ TIẾT ADIPONECTIN,  SẢN PHẨM THỰC PHẨM,  ĐỒ UỐNG,  MỸ PHẨM,  DƯỢC PHẨM VÀ THỨC ĂN CHO ĐỘNG VẬT CHỨA CHẤT ĐIỀU HÒA NÀY|Sáng chế đề cập đến chất điều hòa sự tiết adiponectin,  nhờ đó biểu hiện một cách hiệu quả tác động của adiponectin nhưng tránh được tác động bất lợi của việc tăng cảm giác thốm ăn liên quan đến adiponectin. Sáng chế cũng đề cập đến sản phẩm thực phẩm/đồ uống,  thực phẩm chức năng,  mỹ phẩm,  dược phẩm và thức ăn cho động vật có tác dụng điều hòa sự tiết adiponectin.Theo sáng chế,  fucoza hoặc tiền chất của nó được dùng làm thành phần hoạt tính của yếu tố điều hòa sự tiết adiponectin. Sản phẩm thực phẩm/đồ uống,  thực phẩm chức năng,  mỹ phẩm hoặc thức ăn cho động vật có tác dụng điều hòa sự tiết adiponectin thu được bằng cách trộn với một lượng xác định fucoza hoặc tiền chất của nó.

abs_English: A single sugar extract for use in pharmaceutical,  cosmetic and dietary supplements.|Editing 28/06/2016 monosaccharide extract extracted with aqueous or organic solvent,  mixing with dried monosaccharide,  shaking,  coarse filtering with thin white cloth,  and fine filtering with filter paper. Centrifuging again,  evaporating with rotary evaporation distiller until the extract is dried,  and drying with freezing point drying method or hot air spray drying method. Raw materials or ingredients for use in pharmaceutical,  cosmetic or dietary supplements for cosmetic and health purposes. A monosaccharide extract is extracted with an aqueous solvent or an organic solvent. Mixing with dried monosaccharide,  shaking,  coarse filtering with thin white cloth,  fine filtering with filter paper,  and centrifuging again. The extract is then evaporated using a rotary evaporative distiller until the extract is dried. Then,  it is dried by freezing point drying method or hot air spray drying method. The extract is used as raw material or ingredient of medicinal,  cosmetic or dietary supplement for caring skin and promoting health.
abs_Chinese: 用于医药、化妆品和食品补充剂的单一糖提取物。|编辑28/06/2016使用水溶剂或有机溶剂提取的单糖提取物，与干燥的单糖混合，摇匀，用薄白布粗滤，用滤纸细滤。然后再次离心，然后用旋转蒸发蒸馏器蒸发，直到提取物干燥，再用冰点干燥法或热风喷雾干燥法干燥。用于医药、化妆品或食品补充剂中的原料或成分，用于美容和健康目的。单糖提取物，使用水溶剂或有机溶剂提取。将其与干燥的单糖混合，摇匀，用薄白布粗滤，用滤纸细滤，再次离心。然后用旋转蒸发蒸馏器蒸发，直到提取物干燥。然后用冰点干燥法或热风喷雾干燥法干燥。提取物被用作医药、化妆品或食品补充剂的原料或成分，用于美容和促进健康。
abs_Original: สารสกัดจากว่านตาลเดี่ยวสำหรับใช้เป็นส่วนผสมในผลิตภัณฑ์ยา เครื่องสำอาง และเสริมอาหาร|แก้ไข 28/06/2559 สารสกัดจากว่านตาลเดี่ยวที่สกัด โดยใช้ตัวทำละลายน้ำหรือตัวทำละลายอินทรีย์ ผสมเข้ากับว่านตาลเดี่ยวที่ผ่านการบดแห้ง นำไปเขย่า นำสารละลายที่ได้มากรองหยาบด้วยผ้าขาวบาง และกรองละเอียดด้วยกระดาษกรอง จากนั้นจึงนำไปปั่นเหวี่ยงอีกครั้ง แล้วจึงนำไประเหยด้วยเครื่องกลั่นระเหยสารแบบหมุนจนกระทั่งสารสกัดมีลักษณะแห้ง นำไปทำแห้งด้วยวิธีการทำแห้งแบบจุดเยือกแข็ง หรือวิธีการทำแห้งแบบสเปรย์ลมร้อน สารสกัดที่ได้นำไปใช้เป็นวัตถุดิบหรือส่วนผสมในผลิตภัณฑ์ยา เครื่องสำอาง หรือเสริมอาหารเพื่อใช้ในด้านความงามและสร้างเสริมสุขภาพ----------------------------------------------------------- สารสกัดจากว่านตาลเดี่ยวที่สกัด โดยใช้ตัวทำละลายน้ำหรือตัวทำละลายอินทรีย์ ผสมเข้ากับว่านตาลเดี่ยวที่ผ่านการบดแห้ง นำไปเขย่า นำสารละลายที่ได้มากรองหยาบด้วยผ้าขาวบาง และกรองละเอียดด้วยกระดาษกรอง จากนั้นจึงนำไปปั่นเหวี่ยงอีกครั้ง แล้วจึงนำไประเหยด้วยเครื่องกลั่นระเหยสารแบบหมุนจนกระทั่งสารสกัดมีลักษณะแห้ง นำไปทำแห้งด้วยวิธีการทำแห้งแบบจุดเยือกแข็ง หรือวิธีการทำแห้งแบบสเปรย์ลมร้อน สารสกัดที่ได้นำไปใช้เป็นวัตถุดิบหรือส่วนผสมในผลิตภัณฑ์ยา เครื่องสำอาง หรือเสริมอาหารเพื่อใช้ในด้านความงามและสร้างเสริมสุขภาพ
